查看的角色是这个角色修饰语的拥有者\n
God's Faithful

Hidden Jewish communities have organized under oppression ever since the time of the Babylonian captivity. These groups welcome both those forced to convert away of Judaism, the Anusim, and those who have secretly become righteous converts, the ger tzedek. A community always cares for its own, knowing that as ages pass, true faith is worth persevering for. God will provide.
宫廷魔术师

Believing themselves to be the protectors of understanding and knowledge in a world under the spell of Ahriman's ignorance, Zoroastrians organizing in secret spread the truth and light of Ahura Mazda's wisdom. Charged by their prophet with protecting the water, earth, fire and air, they enlighten others about the struggle between destructive chaos and the good of creation. Even when forced into secrecy there is yet hope, for Zoroaster told of the inevitability of Ahura Mazda's victory.
the Oathkeepers

Knowing of the inevitable coming of Ragnarok, as foretold in their saga scriptures, Norse believers will work even in secret to prepare the world for the snowy hell of the Fimbulvetr and the great battles of all-consuming fire it presages. Practicing their secret rituals in the name of the Allfather, they will accept any kind of warrior who can stand with them in the struggle against the chaos and desolation that other faiths seem intent on bringing upon the world.
Perun's True
地下斯拉夫信徒在狂风暴雨中祈祷，雷声掩盖了他的祷告，暗藏的斧头护身符标志了他们的身份，表明了他们对雷神佩龙的忠诚。此时他们坚信追杀他们的人将会像橡树难敌雷电一样，无力的抵抗即将到来的雷神佩龙之怒火。
the Children of Dievas

As children of Dievas, the hidden followers of the Baltic faith know that everything is connected through the divine spirit, even those who oppress them. So it is that they continue their work unabated, spreading the words of the High Priest even among those who are at first unwilling to listen. Through the divine commonality of Perkunas, Saule or Daugava, they believe anyone can find a home with them.
the Riders of the Blue Sky

No matter how far you travel, and no matter what unbelievers say, you are always under the Heavenly Father, and standing upon the Earth Mother. This is how the followers of Tengri can be so certain in their faith that they follow it even in the face of persecution. All they have to do to prove their faith is to lift their eyes towards Tengri of the Blue Sky above, feel the protection nature provides, and let their Wind Horses ride in prayer to a better place.
the Speakers of Ukko
尽管在其他宗教准则之下，索米多神教信仰的信念仍顽强地存于部分人心中。他们于世间万籁俱寂之处同自然沟通，寻觅真主。他们在月光皎洁、树影斑驳、溪流淙淙之地秘密的崇拜他们的圣主。这种宁静并不能长久，它很快将被乘着闪电战车的雷神乌戈所打破。雷神会用雷霆把不信者化为齑粉。
the Spirit Keepers

As preachers proselytize, there are those who play their part, but in secret turn to the forces around them. No other gods have shown them the small miracles of the world, or the sheer divinity of life and existence. They tell each other stories of how faith does not reside in some otherworldly realm, but in the trees around them, the rocks by their feet, and the waters they drink of.
Zun's Living Fire

The secret followers of Zun have little need for foreign faiths. The answer to every theological challenge and every moment of doubt is right in the sky above them, every day, without fail. It is what brings life and hope, deserving of every prostration. Just as Zun never fails to bring warmth to the earth and drive the night away, his followers will rise on the other side of their own long night.
耶稣会

Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.
the Old Christians

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.
the Islamic Brotherhood
The Sunnis secretly follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam.
阿里的聚会

The Shiites secretly follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam. They spread their belief that God, through Muhammed, chose Ali as his successor, and thus the first caliph of the state of Islam. They will stand by what they believe to be the true word of god.
Sanatana Dharma

Followers of Hinduism believe it to be The Eternal Way, and even when forced to utter the blessings of another spirit, some know that in the samsara all things will come to pass, and the natural order of things will return. In the cycle of destruction and creation, death and rebirth, endings and beginnings, no other truth will stand victorious for long.
the Eightfold Path

Those who secretly follow the teachings of Buddha focus on asceticism and distancing themselves of worldly possessions as much as they can without notice. A belief in rebirth into the wheel of life and death makes them distance themselves of all cravings, which bring only pain. There are those who would rather plant a good karmic seed through rebirth than renounce these teachings, as an open profession of faith is not always needed to grow closer to Nirvana.
the Harmless

To conquer all inner passions is to become Jina. The Jains take five vows of self- discipline and asceticism in their search of spiritual development. Ahmisa: to love and cause no harm to other living beings. Satya: to always speak the truth. Asteya: to never take that which is not willingly offered. Brahmacharya: to adopt chastity or celibacy. Aparigraha: the renunciation of worldly possessions. To be Jain is to never break such vows, even when doing so is in itself a secret that tries Satya to its very limits.
Embarrassed Believer
This character is recovering from something humiliating.
Unimpressed

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, as I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. Hidden in this secret chamber, I can still hear the sounds of people outside. I don't need your judgment, [From.GetSisterBrother].

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols on the wall. "Thank you, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. I needed this."

[From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols, the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols  the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. I have not felt this relaxed in months. [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. [From.GetFirstName] echoes my thoughts, when [From.GetSheHe] finally speaks: "This ceremony is as much for [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], as it is for us". I nod, and we join hands in prayer.

I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] begins to sing quietly, a haunting melody, in reverence to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes, in relief, over being able to practice my faith and to say the words of prayer without judgment. I look over to [From.GetFirstName], who is still singing, and I smile. I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody. I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony  in my heart, something flickered to life.

I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I never saw them myself, but apparently the mother was maimed in the attack. The children will surely be haunted by nightmares for years to come,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.

I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I wish they had been left alone  their business was a vital cog in the local economy and a great source of taxes,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.

I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'Nothing angers me as when people are persecuted and harmed, simply because of their faith!' [From.GetFirstName] growls.
如此无谓的暴力！我真替他们感到心疼。
They were [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and only have themselves to blame!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was visibly moved by the story about the poor family. After our conversation, [From.GetSheHe] became very quiet and only responded in short, half-hearted sentences when spoken to. Just before our departure, [From.GetFirstName] pulled me aside and thanked me for opening [From.GetHerHis] eyes.
I knew we would find an ally in [From.GetFirstName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] only scoffed at my story and haughtily claimed that the family, as 'a bunch of filthy heathens', only had themselves to blame. Then [From.GetSheHe] turned to the [From.GetManWomanOpp] on [From.GetHerHis] other side and proceeded to ignore me for the rest of the evening.
[From.GetFirstName] is not yet ready to accept the truth.

[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We are hopeful that [induction_target.GetTitledFirstName] is of the right mindset and quality of character to become one of us. As we need powerful allies of the cause, it is your mission to show [induction_target.GetHerHim] the light.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Induct [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to the True Faith

We believe that the [FromFrom.GetTitle] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetDynName], could be turned into a supporter of our cause. It is your mission to secretly convert [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Induct Into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith'§! and successfully make [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a secret believer of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. If §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not currently have the §YSympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]§! trait, §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! must be selected and successfully completed first.\n

[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

To bring about the liberation of those who follow the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, we must first win the sympathies of those in power. Approach [sympathy_target.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [sympathy_target.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Evoke the Sympathy of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

The first step towards liberation as well as the religious conversion of lost souls is spreading sympathy for the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. Approach [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [FromFrom.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [FromFrom.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! and successfully make them a supporter of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.\n
Induct Into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith
Attempt to make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a secret believer of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
Has not been approached to be inducted into another faith recently\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to make §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! contemplate the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.\n

I have arranged for one of my spies to leave a tome of the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] with an anonymous note in the [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber] of [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]. If the tome is left open on a passage which [secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName] finds relevant, I am hopeful [secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe] will find truth in the holy words  but what might catch [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHis] eye...?
一部歌颂传奇的武士的史诗。
Leave the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] open on a passage about war and warriors, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Something stressing the importance of community.
Leave the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] open on a passage about community, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
一篇论述伦理和哲学的论文。
Leave the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] open on a passage on ethics and philosophy, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
一段讲述公正而威严的统治者的故事。
Leave the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] open on a passage about legendary rulers, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

As I retired to my [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber], I was shocked to find a copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] on my bed! At first, I thought someone had left it there with the intention to frame me, but then I noticed a little note left on top of the open tome. 'I think you will find this interesting. Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.'
真有趣，我猜读上一点不会有什么坏处……
Read the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
Blasphemy! The unholy words shall burn!
Burn the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
门都没有！我会把它藏到没人找得到的地方。
Get rid of the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary war and the brave heroes who fought in it to defend the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of only a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the importance of family, friends and the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] community. The words intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the greater questions  right and wrong, the higher purpose, the afterlife  and as I pondered the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] perspective on these matters, I found myself intrigued enough to continue reading.

The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary [Root.GetQueenKing] and how [Root.GetHerHis] empire blossomed under [Root.GetHerHis] fair and steady rule. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
真是醍醐灌顶，如梦初醒，就像曾经目盲重又得见，我从来没看到过如此接近真理的言语！
暗中信奉着[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]。\n
Reading this has reaffirmed my confidence in my own beliefs.

My spies have brought me some outstanding news! Apparently [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] read the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] every night and now seems to worship [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], like we do, in secret. My plan succeeded!
It is time for [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] to join us.
Approach §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to recruit [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim] to §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
This will do, for now.
[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I have failed you.
邀请到[From.Society.GetName]
Approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and invite [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
Has not been invited to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§! recently
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! approaches §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with the intent of inviting [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.

The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has everyone's full attention  except mine. My thoughts are elsewhere as I try to ignore [spiritual_gender.GetHerHis] sacrilegious words echoing through the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. Suddenly, my concentration is shattered when the stranger next to me grabs my hand and draws something in my palm with their index finger. The holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I must follow them once [Root.GetReligiousRite] is over!
Follow the mysterious stranger who drew the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbol in your palm.
这可能是个陷阱，我不能冒这个险...
无视那个接近你的陌生人。

I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. It is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]! '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'

I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'My name is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetDynName]. Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
I have been waiting for this day!
Ensure §Y[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you want to join the secret [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] society.
我…我还没准备好。
离开这个小巷并假装无事发生。

I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] followed me into a deserted alley where I revealed my identity and invited [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHim] to join us. [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName] said yes.
Another champion of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] joins our ranks!

I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards, [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] pretended like nothing had happened and I left the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship], my quest unsuccessful.
真是扫兴。

A smile spreads across [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]'s [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Excellent. Then I am honored to welcome you to [secret_religion_recruiter.Society.GetName]. Together we work to bring about the liberation of the true believers and a new era of [secret_religion_recruiter.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s glory. You will receive your first mission soon.'
[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSRFarewell], [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]!
Is also a secret follower of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

Lately, I have found myself worrying about my little [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]. The [From.GetLadLass] is brought up believing in a false god who can offer [From.GetHerHim] nothing but illusions and hollow promises. Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is ready to be introduced to the true faith?
I shall read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName].
No, the risks are too great, for me and [From.GetHerHim] both!
Attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
Do not attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim] and proceeds to read from a thick tome, which [From.GetSheHe] calls 'the [From.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]'. The stories are about kings and queens, '[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]' and the almighty '[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'.

When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim]. With an open [From.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] resting on [From.GetHerHis] lap, [From.GetSheHe] proceeds to explain some 'essential' matters which [From.GetSheHe] says the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has gotten wrong.
噢，[From.GetFirstName]，请告诉我更多！
I guess that makes sense. Can I play now?
那可真蠢！

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. At first, the [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat, but my choice of passage was a good one. Soon [From.GetSheHe] hung on my every word, eyes round as the full moon. As I put the tome away, [From.GetFirstName] bombarded me with questions and we kept talking for hours.
I really got through to little [From.GetFirstName]!

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] seemed to truly enjoy the story. While [From.GetFirstName] was more excited about returning to [From.GetHerHis] playmates than having a conversation about what I had just read, I think I got through to [From.GetHerHim] in some way.
至少，这是第一步。

I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetTrueReligionScriptureName]. I could tell from the first minute that I had a real challenge ahead of me. The [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat and played with [From.GetHerHis] sleeves. However, I was not expecting [From.GetHerHim] to shout at me when I brought up [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I will give this one more try.
It is clear to me now  [From.GetFirstName] isn't ready.

Yet again, I have been summoned to my [GetFromRelation]'s study. [From.GetSheHeCap] is cradling the tome from which [From.GetSheHe] read last time, but today I am not given a lecture. Instead, we are having a conversation about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking me questions and patiently listens to my responses.
我想我现在明白了，[From.GetFirstName]。
But this is not what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] told me!

This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. We discussed [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] and the [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] at lengths, and in the end it seemed like [From.GetFirstName] understood and agreed with my point of view!
[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s truth shall always prevail!

This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. Sadly, even though [From.GetSheHe] was more willing to listen to me as well, [From.GetHerHis] opinions were set in stone. [From.GetSheHeCap] refused to question the things the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] had taught [From.GetHerHim].

As someone who has influence over the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an attempt to secretly induct [Root.GetHerHim] into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
Is not a secret believer in the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to teach [Root.GetHerHim] about the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
Enables you to induct children in your court to your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
Enables you to evoke the sympathy of characters in other religion groups than your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
Enables you to secretly induct characters into your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.

Enables you to spread your true religion secretly among the inhabitants of a county in your realm by right-clicking its county shield in the county view. If you openly adopt your true faith, these counties will convert as well. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.

Enables you to openly adopt your true faith. The other secretly religious characters and counties of your true faith in the realm will convert with you. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
Power: §YBenedictine Diligence§!\nUpon reaching rank 4, you will be approached by a fellow member of the Benedictine Order who will help you to become more diligent.
Power: §YDharmic Wisdom§!\nMakes you lose wicked traits and gain pious ones over time.
Enables you to become celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
Enables you to stop being celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
Enables you to invite a learned ascetic member of the order to your court.

金器匠
庄严王冠
王冠主体由黄金制成，外围镶嵌着四种名贵的宝石-祖母绿、红宝石、蓝宝石和钻石，都有鹌鹑蛋大小。
翡翠权杖
这柄权杖因它上面装饰的翡翠而得名。这些翡翠的数量和质量都不同寻常，它们来源已经不可考，而关于它们的故事像星星一样多。
英雄之剑
这件装饰性武器令人印象深刻。刀片镀上了金，剑柄装饰着来自异域的宝石，如红宝石和蓝宝石，还有描绘了传说中的战士的玛瑙浮雕。
珍珠王冠
这个纯金皇冠的每一寸都被各种大小的珍珠所覆盖，其间还有蓝宝石以及用浮雕手法雕刻着宗教人物的珍珠母。
红宝石权杖
这柄纯金权杖装饰着猫眼石，铁铝榴石和珍珠，顶端镶嵌着一块硕大璀璨的红宝石。
黄金剑
尽管在战斗中毫无用处，但这个镀金的刀刃和刀柄还是会给持有者的每个臣子留下深刻的印象。剑首装饰有一整块硕大的翡翠。
百合王冠
The mass of garnets and opals are truly made justice by the silver and gilded base of this crown. The model is an open one with four stylized lilies.
高贵权杖
镀金的杖柄装饰着珍珠和石榴石，这件宝物彰显了主人的统治权力。
纹饰剑
这把剑在战场上不会给它的主人带来好运，但是精心装饰的刀刃和镀金的刀柄确实看起来很漂亮。
在过去的几天里，我不断地听到了相同的传言。看来，一位最享有盛名的金器匠正路过[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，而我的廷臣们都在兴奋地谈论[smith.GetHerHis]作品。也许我应该邀请这位[smith.GetManWoman]来试试[smith.GetHerHis]手艺？
没什么比珠宝更能展示权威了。
邀请远近闻名的金匠前来你的宫廷。
我没有多余的钱用于这种无聊的事情。
不邀请金匠前来。
那位名叫[From.GetTitledFirstName]的金匠得体的接受了我的邀请，

column1: 仅仅一个星期以后就抵达了。[From.GetSheHeCap]向我展示了一些[From.GetHerHis]之前作品的草图和几封推介信。我很相信[From.GetHerHis]技术，但我还是不敢肯定我能为一套皇冠珠宝花多少钱。

column2: 人人都会看到[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]无可争辩的力量。
不惜成本，订购可以买得到的最昂贵的皇冠珠宝。
I will order something impressive, but sensible.
订购性价比最高的那套珠宝皇冠。
当然，好的手艺才是最重要的吧？
订购最昂贵的那套珠宝皇冠。\n
我改主意了，我不需要你的服务了。
解雇§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。
当[From.GetFirstName] 告诉我皇冠上的珠宝已经完成时，我被兴奋和好奇征服了！当我在我的宝座上等待[From.GetHerHis]仆人扛着这个巨大的箱子穿过房间时，我努力让自己不跳起来。当我终于触摸到沉重的盖子时，我的双手在颤抖……
Regalia worthy of a true [Root.GetTitle]!
[From.GetFirstName]始终让我保持了解皇冠珠宝的最新进展。我知道他们已经接近完工了，但是当今天把沉重的箱子带给我的时候，我仍然兴奋得屏住了呼吸！
[From.GetFirstName]真是个工艺大师！
一个沉重的箱子被送到了我面前，[From.GetFirstName]终于完成了[From.GetHerHis]工作，珠宝皇冠终于制作完成了。虽然我并没有指望着看到什么传说中的工艺品，但我还是不可抑制的期望着看到[From.GetHerHis]作品。
让我们看看[From.GetSheHe]做出来了什么宝贝……
荣耀短剑
这把匕首有着镀金的刀片和装饰繁复的刀柄，璀璨夺目的红宝石、石榴石和钻石被镶嵌在刀柄处的旋转图案上。
红宝石手镯
这些黄金手镯装饰着红宝石和雕刻的象牙片。
宝石短剑
一把用蓝宝石和紫水晶制作护手的精美匕首，它的刀柄上绣有金银丝绣图案。
黄金手镯
一套带有精致的雕刻和花丝镶嵌的沉重的金手镯。
雕花短剑
错综复杂的图案和著名的诗歌刻在这把匕首的刀刃上，它的剑柄上绣有银线和蛋白石和珍珠装饰。
纯银手镯
沉重的银手镯雕刻精美，装饰有象牙和闪闪发光的晶体。
天空头环
这条由许多钻石和蓝宝石串成的项链像夜空一样美丽，它的中心是一枚令人叹为观止的蓝色钻石，足有核桃大小。
辉光项链
当有光线照射时，这条项链上的金子和红宝石闪闪发光，就像着火了一样。
珍珠项链
项链的基底是一环一环的珍珠，一块豌豆大小的紫水晶片悬挂在项链上。
天堂头环
这个壮丽的小环两旁装饰着金色的翅膀和一块非常大而有光泽的蓝宝石。
庄严权杖
这柄沉重的镀金权杖雕刻着古代史诗的场景，并用祖母绿和象牙装饰。
太阳头环
当光线照在佩戴者身上时，黄金和红宝石闪闪发光，就如同太阳本身一样。
黄金权杖
这柄镀金的权杖布满了复杂的花纹。
暮光头环
一只漂亮的嵌有石榴石和珍珠的银指环。
渡鸦王冠
这个纯金的杰作饰有精细的叶子和藤蔓。十几只琥珀色眼睛闪闪发光的乌鸦栖息在头顶上，它们的翅膀大张，就好像要飞起来似的。
海洋之冠
银冠的峰顶呈现波浪形，十几颗珍珠均匀地分布在镶边外侧。
铁王冠
虽然这顶皇冠不是由最高贵的材料制成的，但制作工艺是一流的。它装饰着几何图案，附着有银片。
英雄王冠
皇冠的基底是一条沉重的金带，每一个冠峰都被雕成了传说中的战士的形状，顶部是一整块闪闪发光的红宝石。
先祖之斧
这把镀金斧头上刻着祖先传说的图画。琥珀镶嵌在手柄上。
琥珀王冠
这银冠饰有描绘神明的雕刻和上佳的琥珀。
黑曜石斧
这个斧头的形状很简单，因为材料本身就足够令人印象深刻。头部是由黝黑而有光泽的黑曜石。
纹饰冠
这顶铁冠虽然是用寻常的材料制成，但它精致的花纹使它依旧让人印象深刻。
仪式斧
一个美丽的仪式斧子镶有抛光彩色宝石。

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not slow to accept my challenge. It was a simple one: we would both craft disguises and enter the nearby town at noon the next day. The first person to spot the other, sneak up on them and place a dagger at their throat would be the winner!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] gladly accepted my challenge. We decided to not complicate anything  a duel at midday the following day, a pair of daggers our only weapons. The first person to draw blood would be the winner.
我准备好了。
挑战刚刚开始。\n

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] laughed heartily. ' A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName]'s body shook as [From.GetSheHe] laughed underneath me. 'A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I did not remember when we had lost our weapons. Now we were wrestling on the ground, neither of us getting enough of an advantage, sweat soaking our clothes and stinging our eyes. 'Draw?' I breathed. 'Alright, draw,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled in response.

I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then  the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Impressive disguise, [From.GetSocietyRank]. I mean it,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled and gave me a hearty pat on the back.

We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and nicked my arm as we fell. 'Good match, [From.GetSocietyRank],' [From.GetSheHe] chuckled and rolled over on [From.GetHerHis] back.
我们应该再这么做，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]。
[From.GetFirstName]，你…你棒极了。

现在我们都知道谁是最好的工匠了。

And then  the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Who laughs now, [Root.GetFirstName]?' [From.GetFirstName] whispered before slashing the dagger across my shoulder.

I could read [From.GetFirstName]'s answer in [From.GetHerHis] eyes as soon as the words had escaped my lips and my heart sank like a stone. It took [From.GetHerHim] a moment to recollect [From.GetHerselfHimself]. 'I am flattered, [From.GetFirstName]. Really, I am. But... I do not feel the same way. I'm sorry. Let us be friends?'

For a moment, the world stood still. I could not breathe. Then the most radiant, heart-warming smile spread across [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.GetFaceDescription] face. 'I thought you would never ask, [Root.GetFirstName].'
I am honored to be your friend, [From.GetFirstName].

They are all staring at me, whispering behind my back! As I turn my head towards them, they look away, but I am sure of it. They know. Perhaps not the specifics, but they know. They will come for me, any day now. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...

Some days, I think I am going insane. It is probably all in my head, but sometimes I notice people staring at me. When my courtiers whisper it is impossible to shake the suspicion that it might be about me. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
How long before I crack under the pressure?

[From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my trustful nature. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more wary.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more careful.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my indiscreet behavior. 'Our secret is not easy to keep, but all of our lives depend on it, [Root.GetFirstName].' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more aware of my actions.
I will accept [From.GetHerHis] thoughtful offer.

your visibility and risk of discovery decreasing.\n
你没有学到任何东西。\n

废话！我做得很好。

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. It has been a struggle, but [From.GetFirstName] has been a diligent student and I am most pleased with [From.GetHerHis] development!

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. I knew it would not be easy, but despite our hardest efforts, [From.GetSheHe] has not made much progress.
I expected more from [From.GetHerHim].
When I approached [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] simply dismissed my concerns. I plead to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] to keep the fool in check and all of us safe!

Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week. It has been a struggle, I cannot deny that, but in the end it was all worth it. [From.GetFirstName] is proud of my development and I am relieved to no longer be a danger to [Root.Society.GetName].
I thank you for your help and patience, [From.GetFirstName].
Your visibility and risk of discovery has decreased.\n

Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week to work together. It has been a struggle. I have tried my very best, but can I deny that which is in my nature? Did not [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] create me like this?
I hope [From.GetFirstName] isn't too disappointed with me.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. As defending the Shia Religion and its followers is the reason why exist, our foremost duty, this is an act of the highest degree of treachery. If you want to keep your life, never cross our path again. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize your grave error and return to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. You are banned from [From.Society.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you have publicly embraced the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. While your devotion is admirable, it has put you in a perilous position and we can no longer remain in contact with you.

[From.GetSRFarewell],

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize the grave errors of your ways and return to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. We must protect our own. If you betray our secrets, we will drag you down with us.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a liar. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps..."

I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The mark of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
You carve [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n

You're well aware that a duel with [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a great challenge, but you step up to it and the fight begins. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and you have no idea if their deafening cheers are meant for you or your opponent. The commotion is overwhelming, and you quickly find yourself without a sword, your hand badly cut and unable to grasp the weapon to continue the duel. You try pleading for mercy, but get but nothing but silence in reply as [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises [From.GetHerHis] sword to your throat and stabs. While you fade from this world the last thing you hear is the cheering crowd.

My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. My attempts to follow in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has led me to realize the sinful nature of my lusts. I will try to see [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] for who they are, and not simply objects of my desire, from now on.

Finally, a new era of righteousness has begun. For many years we have worked in the shadows, but the rumors are no longer whispered. The name of 'Hassan-i Sabbah', the conqueror of our mountain fortress of Alamut, is known throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond. The faithful and meek shall find shelter under our wings while the impious and infidels shall fear our fury!
组织顺利地占领了位于叙利亚的山中要塞马斯亚夫，这一消息很快便传了出去。我们的敌人，那些异教徒们开始意识到他们面对的是怎样的敌人了。愿他们永远在恐惧中颤抖。
随着我们最后的据点的陷落，我们的组织被迫隐藏起来。有些人可能认为这就是终结，但他们是傻瓜。我们以前曾在阴影中活着，将来还会这样做。有一天，我们将再次崛起，比以往更加强大！
这些挫折不会击倒阿萨辛！

This is a dark day, indeed. Our righteous order has suffered an enormous setback. All of our mountain fortresses and hideouts have been found and burnt to the ground. The few members who survived the infidels' onslaught are hiding amongst enemies, always in danger. While an era has ended and even though our former glory might never be restored, we shall never give up.
赞美真主！阿萨辛永远不会毁灭！我们在阴影中遭受了很多年的痛苦，但现在，一个新的时代开始了。我们重建了我们的力量，夺回了原来的山中要塞。我们的敌人从现在开始将夜不能寐……

The followers of [Root.Society.GetNameCap] has for too long lurked in the shadows. The time has finally come to reveal our true beliefs now that we are so many that we can no longer be ignored.

The time has come! [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] believes our secret community of faithful has grown strong enough to no longer need to hide in the shadows. It is time to profess to the entire realm that I am a true follower of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], standing proud with my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] brothers and sisters!
最后！

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed an astounding secret. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. I have long held an interest in the practices of [From.TrueReligion.GetName] believers, and [From.GetFirstName] has encouraged all those who hold true faith in their heart to profess.
Welcome me into your arms, [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
I wish to understand the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, but it is still wrong.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed a shocking truth. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. For years they have been building communities of adherents to their faith, and there are even places in my own lands where most of the populace prays to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
他们怎么保密这么久？

While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]! Along with a community of other nobles in my realm who have been harboring infidel beliefs for years, [From.GetSheHe] has now openly professed to what [From.GetSheHe] dares call 'the true faith.'
There suddenly seems to be an awful lot of these [From.TrueReligion.GetName]s...

While there are only a handful of them, there are a few people in [target_province.GetName] who by the grace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] are willing to attend our hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] sermons. It will take a long time, but they will become true converts, and will be able to spread our message to ever more new believers. One day we will openly join together in our faith, without fear of persecution.

With the passing of [target_province.GetName] from our realm, my fellow believers and I are finding it to be more challenging than ever to spread the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] there.\nPeople seemed to be listening, but for now our efforts must be abandoned until we find a new opportunity.

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has proven far easier than I thought. The populace seems unusually receptive to the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], and as the congregation grows in number, so does its influence. We may have a self-sustaining community of believers sooner than we thought.
[target_province.GetName] is blessed by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is going well. As the congregation grows in number, so does its influence, and more people turn to the faith.
We continue in [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s name.

Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is not working out. The preachers I have given charge of the congregation to are struggling to attract new believers, and without growth even some of our early converts are starting to harbor doubts.
我会提供他们需要的所有支持。
We should abandon our efforts in [target_province.GetName] for now.

After much work, dedication and prayer, the community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has grown far larger than what it once was. Believers in great numbers share joy and hardships while ensuring their faith stays hidden from the wider world. The congregation has become a small cosmos of faithful, and new converts find the truth of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by the day.
You all rest in the embrace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!

[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our community is growing steadily in the shadows, but for our ultimate goal to see the light of day we need to have the support of the local populace. You should spread our teaching in the lands of [target_province.GetName].

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

I was in the middle of a conversation with the chef when [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] appears from nowhere, grabs me by the arm and pulls me to a nearby room. With a wrinkled forehead and sweaty palms [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] told me that [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] intend to leave our society after being haunted too many times by shadows in the darkness.
Persuade by talking about solidarity.
解释奉献的重要性。
Use your soothing voice to calm [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim] down.
If that's the way [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] feels about it.

I gave a speech to [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] about the importance of solidarity for our movement. I emphasized how important every member of our society is so that we can be strong together. [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] seemed to sympathize with my speech and told me that [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] will continue to back our cause.

I gave a speech to [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] about the importance of solidarity for our movement. I emphasized how important every member of our society is so that we can be strong together. [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] stood there unmoved by my soft words, still determined to abandon our cause.

I told [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] that this is a time of trials but that we have to endure. [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] observes us and will reward us in due time. Feeling the pressure of divine intervention [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] promised to keep our true faith for the time being.

I told [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] that this is a time of trials but that we have to endure. [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] observes us and will reward us in due time. However, [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] was still more worried about the present situation than divine judgement and ran off before I could stop [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim].

After getting [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] seated and listened to [worried_secret_member.GetHerHis] worried feelings I managed to calm [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim] down. After having ventilated most of [worried_secret_member.GetHerHis] thoughts [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] was determined that our community and cause is something worth fighting for.
人人为我，我为人人！
That makes one less of our meagre company.
不忠的传言
有传言说这个角色不忠于他的信仰
There's a rumor about an artist in the vicinity that creates the most magnificent landscape paintings with features of human nature.
I need to have one of those in my possession.
美丽的画。唉，但我买不起。
I got a personal unveiling of the painting I commissioned for. The artist truly did a remarkable job with it.
但这感觉像少了点什么。
Ask the artist to add some hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.\nShe might take offence to your request.
Ask the artist to add some hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.\nHe might take offence to your request.
我只会添加我自己的一些细节。
To the best of your skills you'll give the painting a touch of [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.
This should be on display for all my prominent guests.
华丽的画作
This remarkable painting almost comes to life and brings you outdoor in nature while you're still observing it from under a roof. A truly enchanting piece of art.

When I showed off my latest addition to my art collection one particular person spent a long time studying the painting. Turns out that it was [society_art_observer.GetSocietyRank] [society_art_observer.GetFirstName] whom later shook my hand and discretely left a [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol] in my palm.
I'm happy to have other enlightened fellows around.
我希望某人能欣赏这个。
I'll have to hide this catastrophe.
Avant-Garde Painting
For good and bad, this painting has its own... unique style.
这听起来正是我想要的。
You disguise yourselves to visit a local watering hole.
Is [society_character.GetSheHe] joking? I have so much to do!
“你被误导了！让我来解释清楚……”
Attempt to resolve the situation diplomatically.
A threat? I'll add injury to those insults!
Go for a distinctly undiplomatic solution.

It didn't take long to calm the brawler, as just a few leaps of logic was enough to convince him that our beliefs weren't so fundamentally different. After sitting together for the rest of the evening, he even reluctantly admitted that there might be something to our [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] arguments after all! Later, [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] complimented me on my theological efforts.

As it turns out, the beginning of a bar fight is not the best place for theological debate. My argument was drowned out by the shout of pain from [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] as the first punch was thrown. After that the entire tavern descended into chaos. To make matters worse, the brawler who had initiated the fight quoted lines from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] as we were thrown on our faces into the street.
我很自豪结果如此出色。
It certainly distracted me from my stress at court.

In these dark times, [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s must stand up for each other. I shoved [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] out of the way of the first punch, and as the tavern descended into brawling chaos I made sure [society_character.GetSheHe] was left unharmed. In the end my fists were battered and bruised, but there was not a single person left standing who dared question me when I proclaimed the superiority of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

Some kind of divine fury must have driven the brawler, for he turned out to be an unstoppable beast! Even as we tried to restrain him simultaneously he merely shrugged us off and let his fists fly. Soon others joined in the fight on both sides, and we crawled our way to safety. As we made our way out we could still hear praise for [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] shouted over the sound of cracking wood and shattering glass.
It felt good to fight in the name of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName].
[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] can prove strength by healing my wounds instead...
关节受伤
中间人
Accept, but secretly worship [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

I feel the [old_religion.Religion.GetName] way of life calling to me still. My [demander.GetLordLady]'s demand for me to abandon my beliefs and never enter my [old_religion.GetHouseOfWorship] again only makes the urge stronger. I find no truth in the [demander.Religion.GetName] faith and truly doubt [demander.GetHerHis] [demander.GetHouseOfWorship] will ever be a place for me.
I will stay a true [old_religion.Religion.GetName], even if I have to do so in secret.
I must purge my mind of these thoughts and fully embrace [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

The order of Abraham the Great follow the monastic rules set by Abraham of Kashkar. Members swear to observe to strict obedience and to spread the word of the three great Nestorian doctors, Nestorius, Diodore of Tarsus, and Theodore of Mopsuestia. Only the literate may join the order and strict celibacy is required. Study and proselytism are the corner pillars of the order and as a member you are expected to spread the Nestorian faith ever eastwards.

The Community of Saint Anthony follows the oldest of monastic rules, set originally by Saint Anthony of Egypt, Saint Paul of Thebes, Saint Macarius and Saint Pachomius. In the spirit of the Great Fathers of Egypt's deserts we value simplicity, submission and humility. It is the duty of miaphysite monks to work to spread the word of Christ, building on the oldest Christian monastic tradition in the world.

The Monks of the Hindu Mathas aim to be an integrative and supporting force in society. Monks can seek to achieve spiritual enlightenment through meditation and scriptural studies or through charity and participating in the local economy. The Mathas are honored and often patronized by the rulers of India.

Members of Buddhist monasteries are expected to follow a strict set of rules aiming to attain Nirvana through a simple and meditative life. Foreswearing all physical property except the bare necessities Bhikkus vow to live only of what others give them.
Jain monks swear to abide by a number of vows, regulations, essential duties and restrictions. They dispose of all personal property, seeking purification and self-realization.
the Fellowship of Hel
The Fellowship of Hel

The Fellowship of Hel are a secret society devoted to the study of dark sorcery and the veneration of the Hel, the giantess ruler of Helheim. Members believe in the power of destruction and will attempt to use dark magic to sate their greed and thirst for death. At Ragnarök they hope to join the forces of Hel and Loke in the fight against the other gods.
Recruit to the Fellowship of Hel

佛陀的牙齿

Having received the news of [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]'s return you hurry to the throne room. As you receive [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] presents you with a small box containing an unusually large tooth. It is with great reverence in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] voice that [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] announces: 'This is the sacred tooth of Buddha. It is the same relic that was once left in the custody of Khema, smuggled out of Kalinga by princess Hemamali and which has since been cared for by the finest kings in all of India'. To be the custodian of this relic is to exhibit the greatest of kingly virtues, it marks the divine right of the holder to rule over men. Your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has brought you a greater prize than you dared imagine.\n\nAs you look up from the tooth itself you realize this is something that has not escaped [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] [relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]. A steady gaze meets yours, this is clearly the look of a [relic_hunter.GetManWoman] that expects a great reward.
光明之山

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] and [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] expedition has returned from their search and now stand before you. In an opened box lies the largest diamond you have ever seen. 'It is known as the Mountain of Light' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] tells you, 'and it is a stone that has brought wealth, prestige and splendor to those that have owned it for centuries.'

Surely with this stone in your hands you will be the envy of every ruler alive. In truth it is as magnificent as it is terrifying, you cannot help but recall the saying that all large gemstones are cursed...

Looking up you realize [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] is and [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] companions are still here, awaiting a reward for the kingly prize they have brought you.

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, presenting you with a carefully wrapped Danda. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that this scepter is of great age and that it has belonged to a number of ancient monarchs before you.

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search and brings with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small crystal-like bead. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] insist that this what remained after the cremation of a great spiritual master and that it is an object of great power.

My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest and brings with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a carefully packaged bone that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] insists once belonged to the great Buddha himself.
撒旦教会
Has not been approached by Lucifer's Own before\n
召唤恶魔
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! lusts for the power of the occult. If so, you may offer [Root.GetHerHim] the embrace of the True Lord.
撒旦教会
撒旦教会

Those who serve the Great Adversary hide in our midst, dedicating their depravities and perfidies to their Lord Satan. Every transgression is a hymn, every murder a roar of defiance against the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Lucifer rewards such dark sacraments handsomely  witches are said to be gifted with unnatural lifespans and all manner of demonic powers.
立即召唤我的宫廷医师！
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] won't receive any more notifications about sick relatives.
I must protect this child of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] has honored me with this child!
Clear Education Trait\n
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] shall lead us to victory!
The blessed child of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is playful...

Odd looking strangers in exotic ships came ashore today, heralds of a great empire far to the west. Oddly enough, they claim that their new ruler came to them from this side of the ocean. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] wishes us to know that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is coming back at the head of a vast army, promising to "bring judgment upon the false god."
Apocalypse Nigh

Our great hope and savior, [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has gathered [From.GetPossPronoun] most devoted followers and boarded a small fleet of longships bound for the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Guided by the Great Serpent, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promised to return at the head of a host such as the world has never seen. All the works of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] shall be cast down and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] will rule the world forever!
Iblis Akbar!
Hail [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
Apocalypse Nigh?

Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]  widely considered the [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]  has gathered [From.GetPossPronoun] most devoted followers and boarded a small fleet of longships bound for the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Defiantly embracing the role of demonic antagonist, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has promised to subjugate the lands of the distant west and return in triumph at the head of a host such as the world has never seen...
[From.GetFirstName] was never right in the head.

There are rumors of exotic strangers in weird looking ships making landfall all along the Atlantic coast. They claim to be heralds of a great emperor from beyond the Atlantic Ocean  a [FromFrom.GetManWoman] from our continent who crossed the trackless seas to somehow become ruler of the peoples of the sunset. This emperor [FromFrom.GetFirstName] threatens doom to all who follow "the false god of Abraham"!
The [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] returns!
The Child of Satan

The day of reckoning is nigh. The [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is finally loose in the world of men! Our new [From.GetMasterMistress] will lead us to victory against the lying Creator and all his weak minions! The brothers and sisters of Lucifer's Own must stand ready to support [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] in [From.GetPossPronoun] relentless march towards Armageddon.
My [From.GetSonDaughter]! I am so proud...
Apocalypse Lost

Our [From.GetMasterMistress], the [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] [From.GetReflexivePronoun], has returned to [From.GetPossPronoun] father in Hell! The brethren are in shock, but we must not lose faith in His great plan. For reasons beyond our ken, the time must simply not have been right. No doubt the Chosen One will return in a different age, when belief in the feeble Creator deity has waned to a mere ember...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]'s will be done!

My [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], was passing by and decided to pay me a surprise visit! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is in a lewd mood and thought we might stage an impromptu orgy in honor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].

My [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName], is feeling lascivious and just suggested that we might stage an impromptu orgy together  in honor of the Great Serpent, of course!
What a lovely idea! I'll wear my [Root.GetDWPartyClothes].
No way! [From.GetPossPronounCap] debaucheries never end well...
Demonic orgies can be rewarding, but remember that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is a cruel master...

Where am I?! Oh yes... the orgy  three days of wicked debaucheries conducted by a Priapic dwarf from Hell. The drugs, the copulation, the succubus with the hypnotic flute... the ritual murder. Was it real? All I know is that [From.GetFirstName] sure knows how to throw a party!

Having indulged in at least four different kinds of exotic drugs, the last three days are a fiery haze in my mind. There was a woman with a forked tongue, a one-eyed dwarf and many other wonderful freaks  some of them might even have been real! Mmmm, and the tricks [From.GetFirstName] and I taught each other!

My memories of the last few days are dreamlike. There was lots of smoke, a cackling old crone and a nubile young woman with a long tail that could do all kinds of things... Oh, and there was a loud midget ordering me and [From.GetFirstName] into various interesting positions. I never realized I liked [From.GetMenWomen] that way...
But most of all, my compliments to the chef!
我感觉很棒！
I feel drained.
I feel like a changed [Root.GetManWoman]...
Let's do it again sometime.
Satyric Blessing
This man has been favored with the virility and animal magnetism of satyrs.
Blessing of Lilith
This woman has been blessed with the sensuality and infernal allure of Lilith, Adam's first wife.
Blessing of Baalberith
Baalberith, the demon prince of murder and chief secretary of Hell, has blessed this character with overflowing coffers.
Blessing of Azazel
Azazel, the Fallen Angel of War, has blessed this character with martial prowess.
Blessing of Avnas
The great demon Avnas has blessed this character with secret knowledge.
Blessing of Belial
The Demon Prince of Trickery has blessed this character with charm and a glib tongue.
Blessing of Mammon
Great Mammon, Prince of Hell, has blessed this character with business acumen.
Blessing of Vetis
Vetis, the Tempter of the Holy, has blessed this character with a devious mind.

After a lengthy discussion about the logistics of an upcoming ritual, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] stood up abruptly, a depraved grin splitting [From.GetPossPronoun] face: 'Well, I'm bored. Let's head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] and have some fun with the peasants!'

After discussing the details of an upcoming ritual, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] stood up abruptly, a depraved grin splitting [From.GetPossPronoun] face: 'Well, I'm bored. Let's head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] and have some fun!' There it was  the expected attempt on my life... Good thing I've already subverted most of [From.GetPossPronoun] retainers!

My [GetFromRelation] and fellow [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName] and I had been discussing a small devotion to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] when [From.GetSubjectPronoun] suddenly stood up, stretched and said: 'I'm in the mood for mayhem! Let's dress up and head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement].'
About time! I'll bring my [Root.GetDWImplements]!
I don't want to risk riling up the rabble.
Demonic outings can be rewarding, but remember that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is a cruel master...

Wearing nondescript common clothes, [From.GetFirstName] and I are slowly making our way to town in amicable silence. As we pass by a neatly kept garden in front of a cozy-looking house, I am suddenly overcome with hatred and revulsion. This family is clearly favored by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...

[From.GetFirstName] and I are riding down to the camp at a lazy trot. As we pass by some children playing in front of an impressive yurt I am suddenly overcome with hatred and revulsion. This family is clearly favored by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...
Keep going. They get to live... for now.
[From.GetFirstName]... it's time to do [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]'s work!
你挑错了邻居，我的朋友...

The father of the family died last. Ah, but the marvels he got to see first! [FromFrom.GetFirstName] carved the wife's face off and pranced around wearing it as a mask, taunting and kissing the man while I boiled baby fat to make a flying potion. Finally, we constructed an idol of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] from the dismembered bodies.

The father broke free just as we were putting out the eyes of the oldest girl. Somehow, the man got hold of a huge pestle and managed to brain [FromFrom.GetFirstName] before I could cut him down! [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must have been displeased with [FromFrom.GetFirstName], but I honored [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] by using parts of [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for the idol of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] I built with the bodies...
全烧了，决不能让任何人知道！
Leaving it would please [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] more...
当地人肯定会...失望

Predictably, the local populace didn't appreciate the glorious monument of flesh that we left for them to find. Rumors are running rife and it won't take much for the whole of [Root.Location.GetName] to erupt into open rebellion.
Ignorant scum. [Root.Location.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] will not save them...

Predictably, the populace of [Root.Location.GetName] didn't appreciate the glorious monument of tortured flesh that we left for them to find. In fact, they were so riled up that they've taken up arms against their rightful rulers!
Playtime is over. I will show them REAL horrors!
I can hear the laughter of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. I have done well!

The tavern was packed when we arrived. [From.GetFirstName] distracted the tavern keeper while I dosed the barrels with '[Root.GetDWDrug]'. An hour later, the mood was getting festive. Two hours later and the crowd had descended into utter madness. [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] knows what they saw while we were offering up the staff to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon].

The tavern was packed when we arrived. [From.GetFirstName] distracted the tavern keeper while I dosed the barrels with '[Root.GetDWDrug]'. An hour later, the mood was getting festive. That's when [From.GetFirstName] decided to play a prank on me, locking me into a room with three burly warriors who were starting to rave and hallucinate...
Amusing. On to the next place, [From.GetFirstName]?
Err, I just drank the beer, didn't I?!
The curse of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] upon you, [From.GetBitchBastard]!
That drug can ruin the mind permanently!
When I came to, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] was long gone... so much for fellowship. Uuuh, I can't think straight. Where am I?
And why am I naked?!

For some time now, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] and I have been researching the proper ritual for invoking a certain [Root.GetDWDemonTerm]. A few weeks back, our kin managed to procure an ancient clay tablet with the missing incantation. We stand ready now to attain powers undreamed of by mortal [Root.GetMenWomen]...

For some time now, my dear [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName] and I have been researching the proper ritual for invoking a certain [Root.GetDWDemonTerm]. A few weeks back, our brethren managed to procure an ancient clay tablet with the missing incantation. We stand ready to attain powers undreamed of by mortal [Root.GetMenWomen]...
Unlimited Power!
Summoning rituals of this magnitude carry serious risks...
We should think this through...
A Grand Summoning

Our coven surrounds the summoning circle, the correct symbols drawn, the fatty candles burning a sickly green. [From.GetFirstName] intones the final invocation just as I offer up the sacrifice... Distracted by the spurting blood, at first I don't notice the man standing in the circle like he was there all along. Looking straight at me with a smirk, he says 'Bravely done, child! You have no understanding of the forces you are meddling with, but I did find your sacrifice pleasing. Quid pro quo  name your desire, [Root.GetBoyGirl]...'
伟大的神啊，我追求力量！

Our coven surrounds the summoning circle, the correct symbols drawn, the fatty candles burning a sickly green. [From.GetFirstName] intones the final invocation just as I offer up the sacrifice... but I bungle the cut and the drugged child starts screaming. The dagger slips from my bloody hands when I hear the insane laughter issuing forth from the circle: 'Pathetic cattle! You are playing with forces you cannot comprehend! Learn your place!' Pandemonium erupts as a fiery figure flashes into being and then starts to fade away. Some brethren start crying or shrieking, others try to kill each other. One sister is trying to poke her own eyes out right in front of [From.GetFirstName], who just stands there, drool running down the corner of [From.GetPossPronoun] mouth.
Pray kill my rival, [rival_1.GetTitledName]!
Pray kill my rival, [rival_2.GetTitledName]!
I feel terrible!
A foul miasma spreads throughout [Root.Location.GetName].
Not my manhood!
Duh? I can't... think...
We won't be able to keep this a secret...
The laughter... it's in my head now!
This is all [From.GetFirstName]'s fault!
While enjoying a quiet snack in my study, I suddenly felt an irresistible urge to jump out the window. Just like in a dream, I walked over and did it.
AAAAaahh...

[FromFrom.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], my [FromFrom.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], wants me to join [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for a lark over in [From.GetName]. There is a certain [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and would-be witch hunter who has been a thorn in our side for some time. It is time to teach the arrogant fool a lesson in manners...

My [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetFirstName], wants me to join [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for a lark over in [From.GetName]. There is a turbulent [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] there who has been antagonizing [Root.Society.GetName] for quite some time. It is time to teach the arrogant fool a lesson in manners...
Time to dust off my acting skills!
That is outside my Realm so we can safely stir up some real trouble!
I don't like it...

We found the zealous [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle] in [FromFromFrom.GetName], praying in seclusion. [From.GetFirstName] snuck up from behind and gave the fool a hard kick in the head. As I gave a devotion to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon], [From.GetFirstName] proceeded to relieve [From.GetReflexivePronoun] on the comatose preacher. Then the butchery commenced...
Tour the countryside, masquerading as the [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle].
With baggy clothes and enough grime on the face, one of us can probably manage a passing likeness...
Host a decadent feast in the idiot's name!
We shall discredit the local clergy with a party that will live in infamy!

Masquerading as the dead [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and attendant, we have been riding between every [Root.GetDWSettlement] and market in [From.GetName], preaching the 'Word of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]' to the masses. Eager ears are picking up on our revolutionary message  the path to salvation requires self-indulgence and the rejection of so called authorities  especially the clergy!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will do the rest!

[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] and I staged a lavish feast in the abode of the dead [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle], taking care to only invite dignitaries who weren't well acquainted. The guests were shocked at the dancers, the half-naked musicians and the heady smoke from exotic 'incense', but when we brought in the prostitutes half the guests stood up and left  the other half were delighted!
What will people think of your servants now, [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]!?

My compatriot in the recent escapade to [FromFromFrom.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], seems to have played a prank on me. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] appears to have told [local_ruler.GetTitledName] that I was behind the rabble rousing.
We'll see who gets the last laugh, [From.GetFirstName]...
I just learned that my neighbor, [From.GetTitledName], has been stirring up the rabble in [local_province.GetName] with heretical nonsense!
That scheming [GetRootFromInsult]!
Decadent Clergy
Songs of Anguish

My nights are plagued by terrible nightmares featuring the vile [dw_buddy.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], my rival [dw_buddy.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType]. [dw_buddy.GetSubjectPronounCap] howls and roars at me to the tune of infernal bagpipes while [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] looks on, bellowing with laughter. I am sure that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is sending me these dreams for a reason... I must prove myself worthy or be discarded as a weakling  such is the way of [Root.Society.GetName].
Invite [dw_buddy.GetFirstName] over for some fun...
不，梦只是毫无意义的胡扯。
[This.GetSubjectPronounCap] will think this is an offer of reconciliation, but I'll have [This.GetObjectPronoun] scream for real...
假装走进这个陷阱...
My treacherous rival is in for a very nasty surprise!

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], declined my offer to lay our differences aside and have some harmless fun together. The [GetRootFromInsult] must have sensed my true intentions...
Damnation!

As [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] arrived for our meeting, my servants threw a sack over [From.GetObjectPronoun] and beat the [GetRootFromInsult] into submission. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is now snugly stowed into a brazen bull that I had built especially for this occasion. Surrounding the bull are some crucified scum from my dungeon, drenched in oil.\n\nIt took some work to find three genuinely insane musicians, but as they start up their demented tune and the fires are lit underneath the bull, I lean back and realize it was all worth it. As soon as the first bellows start issuing forth from the bull, I order the human candles lit. I close my eyes and hum along with the infernal choir, my nightmares conquered once and for all...
These are the pleasures that await us all in Hell!

As [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and I were making our way down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] along a darkened trail, someone suddenly threw a sack over me and I was mercilessly pummeled until I lost consciousness. When I came to, I was hogtied and lying on the cold ground. My blindfold was roughly pulled off and I beheld a great brazen bull with firewood stacked underneath! Hooded characters forced me inside, with my mouth near a funnel of some kind. The hatch closed and soon I could hear demented music and chanting as the bull started to heat up. Please, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. Save my soul!
AAARRGH! AAAAH!

As [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and I were making our way down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] along a darkened trail, someone threw a sack over me and knocked me about a bit. Playing along with the charade, I was whisked away and switched for another bundled up victim...\n\nLater, I watched from the shadows as [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] staged a demented musical ritual. [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] had brought an actual brazen bull, just like the one built for the Tyrant of Akragas in ancient times. Believing me to be inside, the [GetRootFromFromInsult] ordered the flames lit. With the bull heating up, oil was poured over a bunch of crucified prisoners and set on fire  human candles screaming in accompaniment to the bellows issuing forth from the bull. The fool never realized [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] was cooking [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] own [GetFromFromVsFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]!
Hail [Root.GetDWRandomDemon]!
Nemesis

What is this box doing on my desk? Let's look inside... it's a bright white skull, gleaming like a jewel. Hmm, and there's a note: 'I really enjoyed the prank you tried to pull on me the other night! Good thing I wasn't actually in that bull... but, have you seen your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lately?  Your old friend, [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].'
[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]!!!
