The previous owner of this [Root.GetHolding] has been dead for some time now. Time has come to rid the place of this foul spirit!
Foolish Behavior
This character made a fool of [GetHerselfHimself].
武装剑
战斗中许多人装备的普通剑型。
长剑
一把精钢铸成的长剑，可以对敌人造成巨大的伤害。
贯心者
一把精良的角斗剑，以其能刺穿任何盔甲的能力命名被赐名为贯心者，它肯定会让敌人迅速毙命。
复仇
剑用最好的钢材锻造，它被命名为复仇，将给任何背叛者带来注定的毁灭。
狂怒
狂怒是一把巨大而华丽的剑。它一定会给挥舞它的人带来胜利，无论是在决斗抑或战场中。
弯刀
一把比普通长刀质量稍高的弯刀。
精工弯刀
一把反复锻铸的剑刃，可以抵抗大多数武器。
黄金弯刀
黄金弯刀由一个著名的武器大师锻造，它的手柄上饰有金饰珠宝饰物。
幸运弯刀
这把被称作幸运之刃的弯刀由精钢铸成，把手镶金，据说能给它的主人带来好运。
征服弯刀
由最好的工匠打造，征服弯刀是一把象征着胜利和凯旋的宝刀，把手和刀柄上都镶有钻石。
长枪
一种带有金属尖端的木制长矛，在战斗中常被骑兵使用。
双手枪
有了长矛，你可以在与敌人保持距离的同时进行致命打击。
穿刺者
穿刺者是一杆沉重的枪，它的重量就确保了在冲锋时它能够穿透任何轻装敌人的身体。
三叉戟
长枪被命名为三叉戟，配备了一个用最好的钢铸成的长而重的金属枪尖。
破甲者
破甲者被打造的长且坚固，这让任何敢于挡在你路上的敌人都看起来非常愚蠢。
投斧
一种小而制作精良的斧头，通常用于近战和投掷。
战斧
一把更大的战斧能够提供更多的劈砍能力，使它更有效地对付装甲敌人。
切割者
一把可怕的被称为切割者的战斧，它的大小让持有者很容易地用一次打击撕碎对手。
复仇者
一把名叫复仇者的长双刃斧，这把精铁打造的武器将会在你的敌人中大杀四方。
掠夺者
这把轻斧被赐名为掠夺者，这把非常轻巧而精良的战斧可以让你毫不费力地放倒敌人。
钉锤
一把由铁头安装在木轴上制成的锤子。
铁钉头槌
一种完全用铁锻造的长枪，使打击更有力。
破敌者
破敌者是一把巨大且平衡良好的双手重锤，无论你的敌人是否穿着盔甲，它都会很快干掉他们。
碎骨者
这把双手锤被称为破骨者，它又大又重的锤头可以用它的重量碾碎所有对手。
粉碎者
一把在锤尖装有尖刺的战锤，被人恐惧地称作粉碎者，它会粉碎你的敌人，头脑和身体都是。
单弓
由一块上好木材制成的弓。
复合弓
复合弓是用木芯构成，用角筋粘在一起制成的弓。这种工艺使得较小的弓具有更大的力量。
静风
一张质量最高的复合弓，被称做静风，能够无声的让敌人毙命。
闪电
以闪电为名，这张弓能以令人惊讶的力量射出箭矢，在瞬间杀死对手。
雄鹰
正如它的名字雄鹰一样，这张特殊的弓能在极远的地方相当精确的打击敌人。
[Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip2]
Divine relic or not, finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] swims in money!
[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has truly earned my favor!
Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] legendary achievements!
Though an impressive find, finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is richly compensated!
[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] shall have my favor.
Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] impressive achievements!
Finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is suitably rewarded.
[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has earned my favor, I suppose.
Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] achievements!
[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]终于从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，随身带着一个引人注目的精致号角。它产生的音量是无与伦比，在所有听到它的人心中灌输勇气。这是神话中海姆达尔的号角吗？
Andvari's Gift
雷神之锤

Proudly, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] strides into your throne room. With a flourish of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] cloak [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a heavy hammer from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] belt, placing it head-first at [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] feet. Kneeling before it, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] solemnly proclaims: 'I have recovered the hammer of Thor, the Thundergod, himself!'

As you reach down for it you notice that it looks strange  unlike any craftsmanship you have encountered in your realm thus far. The haft is obviously shorter than it was intended to be, and as your fingers touch it is not hard to convince yourself of the surge of power coursing through your body. Surely this means you were meant to wield it!

Looking up, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] still waits for you to speak...
灵魂狂热

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] long travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes up to you and pulls out a small, carefully-wrapped package from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] clothes. With an awe-struck gaze [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] removes the cloth wrapping and reveals a piece of strangely-formed bark.

'I have found the spirits of our ancestors...' [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] whispers reverently, handing it to you. Turning it the right way up, you immediately understand what [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] means. The bark has clearly taken the shape of not just one, but three distinct visages, each staring ominously into your soul. You can sense the connection with your forebears... And the power they no doubt offer you over others.

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has truly proven [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] worth today.
The Mill of Fortune

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] gently places a large box on the floor before you. As [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] men proceed to break it open, a single gold coin rolls falls to the floor through one of the box's widening cracks. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] picks it up and hands it to you, smiling brightly. 'I have found you the Mill of Fortune!'

In the opened box you see a very well-made quern, and your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] continues [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] explanation. 'This is not the first time we have found coins near the Sampo on our way back here. Flour and salt, too... It seems one's fortunes increase just by being near it.'

Rolling the coin on your knuckles you ponder the importance of this find. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] may have found you the means to create wealth from nothingness itself...
佩龙之斧

The gathering of thick thunderclouds overhead accompanies [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]'s' return to your court, and, drenched, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] kneels before you in your throne room, holding up a large axe for you in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] hands. 'The axe, my [Root.GetLordLady], of Perun Himself...'

As you rise and step towards [relic_hunter.GetHerHim], you see the axe's fine quality, and the bolts of lightning clearly visible on the sides of the axe-head. You reach for it, and just as you grab hold and lift it from your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]'s hands a thunderclap can be heard in the distance. Surely this is a good omen!

Holding the imposing axe as if you were born to it, you look down at the awe-struck [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] who brought it to you...
雷神之斧

A proud [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] enters your throne room, a huge weapon on [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] shoulder. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] bows, and when [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] holds out the weapon you see it is a huge two-handed axe, the head of which is crafted out of stone... 'My search has been long and difficult,' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says, 'but what I bring you can be no other than the axe wielded by Perkunas himself!'

You take the axe and inspect it. It does indeed bear a striking resemblance to the description you've heard of it, from legend. It feels heavy and powerful in your hands, and though it might not be the perfect weapon in combat you definitely exude an air of authority around you while you wield it...

Your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], at least, seems impressed, as [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] waits for you to speak.
The Yada Tashy

Paired with a brief, but heavy downpour, a drenched [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] lengthy travels. Once in your presence, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a small box, and opens it to reveal a beautiful, strange stone. With a broad smile [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] hands it to you. 'This... This stone is the Rain Stone... The Yada Tashy. It must be! Rain has followed our every step...'

You hold the stone in your hand, and ponder the earlier downpour's sudden onset. It makes sense! And with this stone, your lands' crops are all but assured to grow well. Other than the obvious benefit in food production, this should also make you more popular among your subjects.

The [relic_hunter.GetManWoman] who made it possible smiles at your elation, waiting patiently...

The time has come to end my wedlock with [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]: if not before [dark_divorce_spell_caster.Religion.GetHighGodName], then before [dark_divorce_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]! Secluding myself, I pray and chant within the confines of the symbols I prepared on the floor. Holding a lock of [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s hair in my hand, only a few more spoken lines are needed to complete the ritual...
找到小宝物
找到中宝物
找到大宝物
Extremely Disappointed
Received Reward
圣彼得的遗骨

At long last, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest to find a powerful artifact. Holding a small metal box, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] appears before you and, bowing, offers it to you. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I have searched far and wide, and have found you the bones of Saint Peter, himself!'

Opening the box to sate your curiosity, you indeed find the aged bones and skull of a man, packed in the small space of the container. Properly protected from the elements, it is likely that they will continue to survive for a long time to come. And so long that they do, they will be sure to improve the Christian world's disposition towards you.

Seemingly expecting for you to speak, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits patiently before you.

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an intriguing piece of clothing. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] gives me a seamless, finely-woven tunic, which [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] claims is none other than the one Jesus wore before his crucifixion!
[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]从旅途中归来时，我的[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]带着一个小而华丽的金属盒子。在它里面有一个古老的用有刺的植物编织的冠冕。这一定是耶稣基督在十字架上戴着的王冠！
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]带着一个小盒子回来了。在盒子里静静地躺着一个又大又旧的钉子。我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]告诉我这是真十字架的一个古老组件！这肯定会提高我在基督教世界的地位。
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]带着一个小盒子回来了。在盒子里面我发现了一小块保存完好的皮肤，我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]保证这肯定是耶稣自己的包皮，而决不是别人！

[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box containing a single fingerbone. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] ensures me that it belonged to a saint, and that therefore it is most prestigious to possess it.
The Staff of the Sixth Day

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, bearing a seemingly ordinary shepherd's staff. Holding it delicately, and clearly treating the simple object with devout respect, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] hands it to you. 'I have found you the staff held by Moses, which split the Red Sea and produced water from naught but rock.'

Indeed, once you hold it is not hard to recognize it for the remarkable object that it is. Created by God Himself on the Sixth Day of Creation, he who holds it is sure to have God's favor!

Smiling as [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] sees the realization of the staff's potential power creep onto your face, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits patiently for you to speak.
The Harp of God's Musician

Followed by one of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] men, who carefully carries a beautiful harp, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] long search. With a broad smile, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] gives a sign for the man to hand you the instrument.

'What you hold in your hands, my [Root.GetLordLady], is what I have determined to be the actual harp played by King David, himself.' Running your fingers over the strings, the sound is almost divine! To have a talented musician play this instrument would undoubtedly put even the most cantankerous of visitors in a good mood.

You highly doubt it would work on [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] if you made [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] leave without a reward, though...

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a small jewelry box within which lies a small, engraved, brass and iron signet ring. Its seal, I discover, is a Star of David, and my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says that all signs point towards this being the seal of King Solomon, himself!
The Prophet's Seal

Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. Within it, you find a crystal-encased, ivory-bordered seal.

'This is the seal used by the Prophet Muhammad', your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says as you inspect the beautiful object. 'It must be, for it matches all depictions we have of the seal used on Muhammad's letters.' Not only will the Muslim world now surely look up to you, but you can henceforth also claim to write with the authority of Muhammad, himself!

Your [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits as you gaze at the seal, clearly expecting a reward...
The Prophet's Battle Standard

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes before you, proudly carrying a large, inspiring banner. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] does not need to speak for you to recognize it, for it has all the necessary signs allowing you to readily identify it as Muhammad's personal standard.

With it, you will not only be an inspiration to the men under your command, but also to the Muslim world as a whole. Holding it in your hands, you feel the connection to the Prophet, and you know that your men will fight like lions wherever it is seen.

As draw your gaze away from it, you see your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is still standing there, waiting...
The Prophet's Blessed Mantle

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search, followed by two men who carry a heavy, ornate gold box, which they place on the floor before you. Bowing, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] proclaims: 'My search is concluded. I have brought home with me the Blessed Mantle  a gift from the Prophet Muhamad to the poet Zuhayr.'

Opening the box, you find the Mantle wrapped in forty pieces of richly-decorated cloth. The mantle itself is a beautiful buttoned white coat made from goat hair, sure to increase your standing in the Muslim world.

Pleased, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] waits for you to speak...

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a beautiful sword. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it is one of the Prophet Mohammad's nine swords! Not only is it a finely-crafted blade, but it should also make men more eager to follow me in battle.

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box within which lies an ancient piece of parchment  a letter addressed to an ancient foreign ruler. Age has not worn the letter past legibility, and so it is possible to clearly identify the signature of the Prophet Mohammad, himself!

[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small glass reliquary. Inside, one can clearly see a single hair, which my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] claims is a hair from the beard of the Prophet Muhammad, himself!

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated flask filled with some kind of liquid. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is a flask of rose water that has been infused with holy power by dipping a single button of the Blessed Mantle into it. It purportedly has miraculous qualities!
The Cup of Jamshid

At long last, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest to find a powerful artifact. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] reaches in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] satchel and produces a beautiful golden cup, which [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] hands to you.

'This can be no other than the Cup of Jamshid from myth,' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says, 'drink from it and the truth of this world and all seven heavens will be yours!' The significance of this find sinks in as you hold the cup and listen to your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]'s words... Properly utilized in a ritual of divination, this cup could indeed, if the legends are to be believed, provide you with the answers to many questions.

After a short while you realize [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] is still waiting...
The Babr-e Bayan

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes before you, proudly carrying a large coat made of leopard-skin. Handing the garment to you reverently, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] explains: 'After a long and arduous search, I have recovered the Babr-e Bayan  Rostam's legendary coat!'

Despite Rostam wearing it in many a war, you find no damage whatsoever on the dark-colored garment as you inspect it. This can only be interpreted as proof of its legendary invulnerability! Donning it yourself would certainly make you much less likely to come to harm in personal combat.

As you ponder this find's implications, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is seemingly waiting for a reward...

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an unbelievable find! The Derafsh Kaviani, long thought to have been lost and destroyed when the Muslims invaded the Sasanian Empire, seems to have survived, and has now returned to its rightful Zoroastrian holders! This leather banner, in red, purple and gold, will hang beautifully in my throne room.

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a box containing a small sapling of a strange bush. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is convinced that this is a sapling that has sprouted from the divine Haoma bush, and surely, based on its strange looks, it cannot be anything else!

[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a large, beautiful cypress branch. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] tells me that this is a branch of the mighty cypress tree that Zoroaster himself planted in Keshmar! Perhaps an equally mighty tree will sprout from it, here.
This jeweled circlet of gold has a central band of iron that was beaten out of a single Nail of the True Cross. It has been used for the coronations of the kings and queens of Lombardy, since.
The burial shroud that Jesus was wrapped in upon his death. It still bears the clear image of a man, including a hauntingly-real imprint of a face.
Lance of Longinus

The spear that the Roman soldier Longinus thrust into the side of Jesus, as he hung from the cross, to ensure that Christ was dead. The miraculous combination of blood and water flowed from the wound and coated the lance.
The chalice Jesus used at the Last Supper. Said to have contained the Blood of Christ after being taken down from the cross, it must surely possess magical powers!
圣杯
The chalice Jesus used at the Last Supper. Said to have contained the Blood of Christ after being taken down from the cross, it must surely possess magical powers!
圣钉
圣钉是历史上的把耶稣钉在十字架上的三或四颗钉子，拥有圣钉能大大提升你在基督教世界的威望。
This small iron box contains the remains of the apostle Peter, himself, by some considered to be the First Pope. To possess it is to be the envy of the Christian world.

The foreskin of Jesus Christ, cut and placed in an alabaster box of spikenard oil on the 8th day after his birth, so that it might be preserved. Thus, it is the only body part of Christ remaining on Earth, after his ascension into Heaven.
The crown of thorns that Jesus wore during his crucifixion. Once intended to mock Jesus' claims of divine authority, it now has become a symbol of precisely that.

The woven tunic that Jesus wore before his crucifixion. Rather than divide it into four parts, like Christ's other garments, the tunic was without seams, and so was kept whole by the soldiers who had crucified him.

The staff given to Moses by God, who had created it on the Sixth Day of Creation. It performed many miracles, such as splitting the Red Sea, producing water from rock, and possessing the ability to turn into a cobra.

King David of Israel, before becoming a king, was an accomplished harpist at the court of King Saul. This is the harp he played, and even after all these centuries it is still a remarkable instrument.
This engraved, brass and iron signet ring sports the Seal of Solomon: a hexagram or Star of David. According to legend, it allows its possessor to command demons!
The Ark, crafted out of shittim wood at God's direction, containing the stone tablets of the Ten Commandments and a pot of manna.
The white mantle of goat's hair given by the Prophet to the poet Ka'b bin Zuhayr. It was later sold by his children to Muawiyah I, the founder of the Umayyad dynasty.
By soaking the Blessed Mantle in rose water, it is possible to infuse the Mantle's essence into potable form. This water is said to have miraculous qualities!
This is the seal the Prophet used to sign and seal any letters sent by him, so that none would doubt the author's identity.
The Sacred Standard of the Prophet, himself, sure to instill great courage in all God-fearing men upon the battlefield.
A letter to a foreign king, penned and signed by the Prophet Muhammad, himself.
This fine and richly-decorated blade is of the Prophet's nine swords: Al-'Abd, Al-Ma'thur, Al-Rasub, Al-Battar, Hatf, Qal'i, Dhu al-Faqar, Al-Mikhdham, and Al-Qadib.
A clear glass reliquary that contains a single strand of hair from the beard of Muhammad, shaved after his death by the Prophet's favored barber.
This golden cup, supported by a winged lion, is said to contain an elixir of immortality. It can also be used to divine deep truths both in this world and the Seven Heavens.

Zoroaster, himself, planted a great cypress tree in the area of Keshmar at least a thousand years ago. The tree's magnificence and size are legendary, and these qualities can be clearly observed within this branch.
The legendary hero Rostam's dark leopard-skin coat. Worn above a suit of armor, it is said to be impervious to harm from weapons, fire, and water.

A sapling of the divine Haoma bush, a fragrant golden-green bush that is said to grow on mountains. It can be consumed to aid healing, physical strength, alertness and awareness, and the cravings of the flesh.
雷神之锤
A strangely short-hafted hammer that looks as if it might have been flawed during production. It bears a striking resemblance to the hammer wielded by Thor, the Thundergod, as told in myth.
安德华拉诺特
This beautiful golden ring seems to make wealth flood to its owner, though all know Andvari's Curse draws ever closer...
加拉尔号角
This magnificent horn produces an unmatched volume when blown. It matches closely the description of Heimdall's Gjallarhorn in myth.
The Fetish of Souls
A piece of bark that has grown into the shape of a trip of visages. The trio's unsettling gazes pierce one's soul, almost as if some form of spirit still remains behind their eyes...
Sampo
A strangely well-crafted quern, bearing a striking resemblance to the Mill of Fortune. It is said to be able to produce gold, flour and salt from nothing at all.
Axe of Perun
This exquisite bearded axe is adorned with the symbol of Perun himself: a lightning bolt. It seems to be the Thundergod's very own weapon!
Axe of Perkunas

This stone axe strongly resembles the axe of Perkunas himself, as described in myth. Though not terribly useful in personal combat, you feel more confident in your military decisions while holding it...
Yada Tashy
This strange and beautiful stone is said to be able to summon rain. A prosperous harvest is all but assured for its holder!

The voices that have plagued me recently have begun to recede. Those who are close to me have told me they thought me possessed by a demon of sorts... But no more! What little voices remain seem to disappear whenever I clutch Solomon's ring. Perhaps it truly does hold power over demons?
No demon shall hold sway over me!
Alas! It was just a brief interval of lucidity...

Since I possess the Blessed Mantle, it would certainly be possible to instill a portion of the Mantle's power into drinkable form. This could be done through a ritual involving soaking the garment in an infusion of rose water, and catching the water that is wrung from it in bottles. To do it right, the ritual would have to be quite expensive, however...
这听起来是个绝妙的主意！
No, this sounds too expensive.
This mysterious axe has a purple sheen, and has the strange symbols '+' and '2' engraved in the handle. It seems to be of quite... epic... workmanship, compared to regular weaponry.
奇怪的箱子
This strange chest has been made out of an unknown type of metal. Despite not being able to open it, you can clearly tell the chest is not empty.
This aberration of a weapon must be destroyed!
The Necronomicon
A mysterious book dealing about the strange spheres beyond. Many strange and unholy truths are recorded on its pages...
圣约翰的指骨
A finger belonging to St. John the Baptist. St. John was a prophet of the Messiah, and was also the one to baptize Jesus.
Head of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
The venerated head of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once contained great wisdom.
Tongue of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
The venerated tongue of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once spoke many eloquent truths.
Tongue of an Unbeliever
The despised tongue of a foul unbeliever. It once spread lies and deceit.
Hand of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
The venerated hand of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once held mighty weapons, winning him great victories.
Arm of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
The venerated arm of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once held a scepter in just rule.
Foot of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
The venerated foot of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once bore him on many long travels.
Ancient Rusty Weapon
An ancient, but rusty weapon. It once belonged to a great hero, but is now only fit for display in a collection.
Chains of St. Peter
The chains that held St. Peter in Herod's dungeon, until the saint was released and led to freedom by an angel.
Right Hand of St. Demetrius
The right hand of St. Demetrius of Thessaloniki, one of the patron saints of Crusades. He blessed Nestor so the man might defeat the pagan giant Lyaios, for which both were executed.
维罗尼卡的面纱
The cloth used to wipe Jesus' face clear of blood and sweat. The Sudarium still bears the image of the face of Jesus Christ.
Image of Edessa
A piece of cloth on which the face of Jesus was imprinted. King Abgar of Edessa received it from Christ to cure him of an illness.
Remains of St. Cessianus
A small box containing the bones of a child. They belong to Cessianus, who was murdered at the age of eight during the persecutions of Roman Emperor Diocletian.
哭泣的雕像
A statue of the Virgin Mary. Every now and then, a drop of water or even blood will trickle down from the statue's eyes, in what can only be described as a miracle.

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved head. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the wisdom it once contained?

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved tongue. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the eloquence it once possessed?

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved tongue. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to an infamous unbeliever! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of penchant for deceit its owner once possessed?

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved hand. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might guide my hand when next I find myself in battle?

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved arm. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the knowledge of statecraft its owner once possessed?

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved foot. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! It helped its owner to travel far and wide, but now it will go nicely in my collection...

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an ancient, rusty sword. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! By adding it to my collection, it will surely make me the envy of the known world!

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box within which lie a pair of ancient iron manacles and chains. These, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] claims, once held Saint Peter in Herod's dungeon!

[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small metal box. Inside lies a mummified hand, which my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] claims belonged to Saint Demetrius!

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated frame, containing a piece of cloth with a clear outline of a face. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the cloth used by Veronica to wipe the blood and sweat from Jesus' face as he bore the cross!

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an old metal box. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that the bones within it once belonged to St. Cessianus, who was martyred in Diocletian's Great Persecution.

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a beautiful wooden statue of the Virgin Mary. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that every so often, the statue miraculously cries tears of water or even blood!

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated frame, containing a piece of cloth with a clear outline of a face. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the miraculous image of Jesus sent by Christ to King Abgar of Edessa to cure him of an illness!
Cloak of Mohammad
A cloak that has been worn by the Prophet Mohammad. This alone is reason enough to accord it a shrine of the highest importance!

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me an old, but beautifully-made cloak. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], it was worn by the Prophet, himself! Showing it to the populace at times of unrest might well help calm them down...
Tooth of Mohammad
A tooth that once belonged to Mohammad. It was lost when the Prophet was struck by a battle axe at the Battle of Uhud.

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a tiny wooden box, containing a piece of cloth within which lies a single human tooth. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is one of the four teeth Mohammad lost at the Battle of Uhud!
Mohammad's Bowl
The bowl from which Mohammad drank soup prepared by his first wife Khadija.
Blessed Sandals
The Prophet's sandals, said to bestow Mohammad's blessings on those who touch them.

Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a simple bowl. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that it is the very bowl from which the Prophet ate soup!

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a pair of very old sandals. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that they were once worn by the Prophet, himself! It is said they still bestow Mohammad's blessings upon those who touch them...
居鲁士文书

A clay cylinder praising the Persian King Cyrus as the rightful conqueror and benefactor of Babylon, and describing how he rebuilt its walls, temples and sanctuaries. An inspiration for all Persian rulers!

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an ancient clay cylinder, covered in inscriptions. When translated, they speak of King Cyrus's rightful conquest of the city of Babylon, and how he was a great benefactor of the Babylonian people. Being a Persian ruler, like Cyrus, this is welcome reinforcement of my right to rule!
The Tabernacle
A portable tent and place of worship that served the Israelites from the time of the Exodus to their conquest of the Promised Land.
King David's Sling
The sling that King David used to fell the giant Goliath in personal combat.

[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an large wagon willed in ancient cloth and poles. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that this is the famed Tabernacle that our ancestors used on their way to the Promised Land!

Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a small wooden box, containing a well-made leather sling. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the very sling King David used to defeat Goliath!

Hmm, interesting.

As things have settled down a bit after you inherited your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm, you decide to enter the treasury and see what [cursed_diamond_parent.GetSheHe] has left for you. 该死！我想我会再一次找到它的...
Has not attempted to corrupt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! the past §Y10§! years\n
Has the quest §YCorrupt [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n

There are a few monasteries close by, where the lay members of [Root.Society.GetName] frequently convene. As such, it is expected that I every so often attend these meetings, and that I spend a fair amount of time at these monasteries to get in touch with the monastic foundations of the order. Such a period is about to start.
I will fulfill my duties, as expected.

I have now been at the monastery for a few days, surrounded by others who share my passion for [monastic_befriender.Religion.GetHighGodName]. And yet, I still find I miss having a friend. [monastic_friend.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_friend.GetFirstName] and myself seem to be getting along quite well, though... Perhaps this could blossom into a true friendship if we did something together? I'm sure [monastic_friend.GetSheHe] would greatly enjoy...
...玩一种军事策略的游戏。
...discussing [monastic_befriender.Religion.GetScriptureName].
...discussing the intricacies of managing a realm.
...taking a stroll and simply enjoying some small talk.

[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName] truly enjoyed my suggestion, and we have become close friends! We regularly seek each other out during our free time, and I am starting to notice that it affects my focus on my monastic duties...
Let's focus on my duties. It is why I am here, after all.
Let's spend more time with [monastic_friend.GetFirstName].

Spending time in the monastery all day, alongside my friend [monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName], I am sometimes overcome with sinful cravings of the flesh... It is surely simply the lack of [monastic_befriender.GetMenWomenPreference] around here! I suspect that [monastic_friend.GetFirstName] is also plagued by this.
I will manage, somehow.
Well, what are friends for?
If §Y[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§! enjoys this activity, this might lead to a friendship. Perhaps if it related to [monastic_friend.GetHerHis] education...?\n
What is the harm? It is not as if we are doing anything... Unnatural.\n

宝物被盗

宝物庆典
Caught Red-Handed

Doing Penance

Patron of a Relic
This character has selflessly used their personal wealth to fund a celebration in honor of a monastery's relic.

Visiting the monastery at which my order has convened this time, I join my fellow lay members in dutifully performing all tasks required of us. In the evening, after the day's hard work, the Abbot gathers all of the visiting lay members, and reveals the monastery's great treasure: a great relic that has been safeguarded here for many generations!
That's nice, I guess.
Let us celebrate its glory! I'm paying!
This will likely please everyone in the order.\n
It should be mine!

Having decided that the relic would be much better 'safeguarded' in my own hands, I must now tackle the task of how to 'liberate' it from the confines of the monastery. I can think of a few different paths to take...
Grab it and RUN!
Though bold and simple, simply waiting for nobody to be looking and then running as fast as possible is not likely to result in success...\n
Bribe the Abbot.
Bribing the Abbot to ensure nobody is around would be almost guaranteed to succeed. He is, however, just as guaranteed to have a high price...\n
Play a trick on everyone.
Using your superior sense of subterfuge you might stand a decent chance at successfully taking the relic without anyone noticing.\n
I will ask my lover to help me!
The power of love always succeeds! ...right?\n

Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact, savoring the feeling of it in my hands... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] looking at me with wide eyes!
You have caught me... I submit to the order's judgment.
Surrender to §Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§! and do public penance to atone for your actions.\n
Use their surprise to make a break for it!
You're sure you can escape, however, this will upset your Brothers and Sisters greatly, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
Leave no witnesses!
Attempt to murder §Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n

I have done it! I have the relic and there is not a scratch on me! I have covered my tracks as best I can. Nobody seems to suspect it was I who killed [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] and took the artifact.
It had to be done.
I have done it! I have the relic and only suffered a minor scratch in the scuffle. It will heal in time, and I even managed to hide it from my Brothers and Sisters.
Good, but... Ow!

I have the relic, but it almost literally cost me an arm and a leg... I was lucky to only have lost what I did, and even more so that everyone seemed to believe the tale I spun of bravely fighting off the 'unknown thief'.
I'm not sure this was a good trade...

As I dash towards [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim], [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] does not seem to be as surprised as I took [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] for! Swiftly [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSheHe] draws a blade, and as I wrestle [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] to the ground I feel the cold metal sink in my chest...
Noooooooooooo!

I have done it! I have the relic, and shook off my pursuer. But [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] saw me blatantly steal the artifact, and so my life in the order is certainly forfeit...
Details, details!

Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find my lover [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName] keep [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] distracted, allowing me to make my escape unnoticed!
Love DOES always win!
My plan went flawlessly! Not a single soul saw or heard me during the night, and it was not ere daybreak that the theft was discovered. Nobody suspects it was I!
I am the best!

My offer of funding a celebration of the relic was well-received, and has heightened my standing in the eyes of my Brothers and Sisters! For many days we sang, prayed and paraded the holy relic around the nearby villages. Donations to the monastery have increased greatly! All in all, it was a tremendous success.
Well worth the money!
The society's members are pleased with your celebration!\n
Did not betray society\n

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I know it was you who murdered [monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName] and who took our prized relic. As soon as I have the necessary proof, I shall expose you to the order!

Signed,
[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetFirstName]

Allow [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim] the honor of returning the artifact, and buy [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHis] silence!
Keep it, regardless!
Your Brothers and Sisters will undoubtedly be extremely displeased, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
This will place my lover §Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§! in a very awkward position!\n

I found out that my lover, [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName], could not bear the shame of being incriminated in my theft of the artifact, and rather stepped out of life than face [monastic_artifact_lover.GetHerHis] Brothers and Sisters any longer.
Oh no... My dear §Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetFirstName]§!!
Start planning the theft of the §YSeamless Robe of Jesus§!!
Start planning the theft of the §YCrown of Thorns§!!
Start planning the theft of the §YFragment of the True Cross§!!
Start planning the theft of the §YHoly Prepuce§!!
Start planning the theft of the §YImage of Edessa§!!

Still dressed in traveler's garb, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] enters your throne room and kneels before you. Looking rather pale and a bit sickly, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a small object, placing it gingerly in the palm of your outstretched hand.

'Andvari's Gift... The Andvaranaut, my liege...' [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] whispers reverently. 'It must be. Its power is undeniable, it has already brought me many riches on the road back to the court.' You nod solemnly in response. Though it feels light in your hand, you already feel the burden on your soul. This ring must have enormous power, but you remember hearing in legends the curse that lies upon it...

Regardless, with this find [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has truly surpassed [relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]!

Write a Magnum Opus
Record your life's work for posterity in an encrypted Magnum Opus.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already written a Magnum Opus\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on ritualistic Theurgy\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on contemplative Theurgy\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on stellar Astrology\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on planetary Astrology\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on alchemical Universal Panacea\n
Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on transmutative Alchemy\n
Writing Magnum Opus
This character is writing a Magnum Opus.

Secluded at my writing desk, quill in hand and plenty a bottle of ink nearby, I find myself staring down upon the blank parchment. The sheer scale of the task upon which I am about to embark dawns upon me  I need to record my knowledge, but also hide it from those who are unworthy...
It will take a great deal of time and effort, but it will be glorious!

Over the past few months I have developed an elaborate cypher that I will use to encode my life's work. However, before I can continue I must decide upon a direction in which to take my Opus, as the sum of all my knowledge is simply too great to be recorded in a single book.
Focus my efforts on writing on Theurgy.
Ascension and union with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is what future generations must strive for.\n
Focus my efforts on writing on Astrology.
The movements of the stars and planets will allow your successors to understand the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
Focus my efforts on writing on Alchemy.
Through working with transmutation and healing agents your heirs can transform and perfect themselves.\n

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of Theurgy, but it is still too vast to touch upon everything. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Theurgy's aspects.
I will focus on rituals and invocations.
Rituals allow one to invoke the will and presence of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], a necessary first step if one wishes to ultimately unite with the Divine.
I will focus on the art of contemplation and meditation.
Contemplation allows one to draw nearer to the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], and possibly achieve true Understanding.

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of the stars and planets, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Astrology. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Astrology's aspects.
I will focus on the stars.
The stars hold extensive knowledge, and proper reading of them will bring one closer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
I will focus on the planets.
The planets, and their motion through the stars, reveal clues about both the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] as well as the personalities of individuals.\n

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of transmutation and panacea, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Alchemy. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Alchemy's aspects.
I will focus on the Universal Panacea.
The Universal Panacea would cure all diseases and allow life eternal, bringing the natural human body to perfection.
I will focus on transmutation.
Transforming metals into gold is a necessary stepping stone towards transforming and perfecting oneself.

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on ritualistic Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
Ascend and be one with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on contemplative Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
Open your mind to the Truth of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on stellar Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s Truth is in the stars!

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on planetary Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
The Will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is revealed in the movement of the planets!

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on alchemical Universal Panacea. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
Perfect is the body that is free from disease and age!

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on transmutative Alchemy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
Turn metal into gold, and the soul will follow suit!

Your [From.GetJobTitle], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, has secluded [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§! and is thus unable to perform [From.GetPossPronoun] tasks for the time being.
Attempt to Abduct
Attempt to abduct and imprison §Y[This.GetBestName]§! with the help of your brethren in §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.

I have put the word out among my brethren in [Root.Society.GetName]. When an opportunity presents itself, the brothers and sisters in [From.Capital.GetName] will attempt to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in chains...
There is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] anymore, considering [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is dead!
Annoying!
[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has ended up in prison, so there is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] anymore.
Very well...
My brethren are not having much luck in their attempts to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps [Root.Society.GetName] are not influential enough to pull it off... Should I call it off?
Chances would improve if our Society Influence was higher in the world...
[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has joined [Root.Society.GetName], so the brethren will no longer assist with [FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun] abduction.
This might take a while...

My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have informed me that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] plans to travel the realm incognito for a lark, mingling with the common folk. [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will only be protected by two loyal friends during this little adventure  a great opportunity to have [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] abducted, if I so wished...
My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have managed to insert themselves among the servants of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and stand ready to snatch the child at my command.
Approve the scheme!
No... I have a bad feeling about this.
The plan to abduct [This.GetFirstName] is set in motion.

I had been playing with my friends for hours in the field when one of my attendants suddenly made a strange noise and keeled over. All hell broke loose as the guards and servants started fighting each other. A veteran soldier picked me up and started running back towards home...
Someone is picking me up. I don't know this strange lady, and where is she taking me..?
...but he stumbles and falls, blow dart in his neck!
These people look mean!
...and keeps running, saving me from the traitors!
The guards stopped the lady and brought me back.
My guards tell me they suspect [From.GetTitledName] of this outrage!
My competent brethren in [Root.Society.GetName] managed to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] from [From.GetPossPronoun] guards and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in a sack!
My incompetent brethren in [Root.Society.GetName] failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], though apparently they slew a guard and a servant in the attempt.
Idiots!
No, I'll just have to be patient.
Attempted Abduction
Stop Abduction Scheme
Call off my Society members from abducting my current target.
Abduction efforts stop
Stop Trying to Abduct
Stop trying to abduct §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!. I should turn my attention elsewhere...
Your [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!, was attacked by heathens in §Y[wounded_location.GetName]§! while trying to spread the faith.

I can hardly believe it, but I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] consorts with demons and secretly worships [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is a member of a cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] is a member of a subversive cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
Charge: Secret Cultist
Charge: Witch
[From.GetTitledName] has found out that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName]! This is obviously a disaster and a just cause for imprisonment, title revokation... or execution.
[From.GetTitledName] claims to have proof that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName]  just cause for arrest and imprisonment!
[From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a witch and a demon worshipper! How should I use this information?
[From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a member of [target_spy_on.Society.GetName]! How should I use this information?

[From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a witch and a demon worshipper and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...

[From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a member of [Root.Society.GetName] and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
Publicly denounce §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n

Suggest that §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! take §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! as a concubine.
Since she is your close relative, he will be duly grateful (§G+$OPINION$§!).

I think [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] would make you a most suitable concubine!
Select a Suitable Concubine
Grateful for Concubine
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is Prestigious
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your vassals, courtiers, and rivals, in an attempt to possess them with a fanatically loyal demon...
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], keeps asking me to press [From.GetPossPronoun] claim on [claimant_claim.GetName] for the glory of our dynasty.
炼金协会
炼金协会相信这个世界上有无穷无尽的值得去探索的真理，作为炼金协会的成员，你将通过不断的试验，破解古文，研读神秘的符号去寻找蕴藏在星空和大地之中的真理。
[Root.GetFullName] starts the construction of a Laboratory.
Esoteric Knowledge
Construct Laboratory
Constructing your own laboratory will help you in the various experiments needed to delve into the deeper truths of creation. It can however easily get very costly...
A truly useful Laboratory can take both time and money to assemble but without an office dedicated to alchemy I doubt I will ever be able to unveil the deeper secrets of the world.
For science!
On second thought, there are more pressing matters.

Secrecy is of great importance as the experiments I will perform in my laboratory may both frighten the ignorant and tantalize my fellow alchemists. To keep intruders away laboratories are often built deep within a castle, but a more accessible building would likely be more efficient...
My secrets will be safe deep within the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
The plans for your laboratory will have to fit into your existing castle.
Let us build an efficient and accessible office for research!
The plans for your laboratory will only be dictated by what is most efficient but your secrets will not be as well guarded.
Let us build a guarded compound on an island.
Let us build a remote guarded compound.
Though isolated your laboratory can be as big as it needs to be.

In order to properly heat and transform metals or other substances I require furnaces of differing temperature and flames of different types. The alchemical texts speak of various setups that could be beneficial.
A modest setup with one furnace will be enough.
[Root.GetFullName] will aim for a small but functional laboratory.
I can work around a small but varied setup.
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build a laboratory that can handle somewhat more complicated procedures.
I will require a state of the art laboratory!
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build an advanced laboratory, capable of handling a number of complicated procedures.
I will aim higher than any of those that have come before me!
[Root.GetFullName] will build an experimental setup with as many furnaces, basins, and other contraptions as can reasonably be fitted.

The glass in which I keep my concoctions is brittle and breaks easily. This may be tolerable for beakers and other dispensable glass but earlier today a giant alembic shattered into a thousand pieces after having been heated carelessly by one of my helpers...
Let us try to limit their use then.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep buying glass of inferior quality but helpers will be instructed to handle it with extreme care from now on.
We must only every buy the most expensive and durable glass.
[Root.GetFullName] will from now on spend more to ensure all glass that enter the laboratory is as durable and clear as possible.

Not all pottery is suited for the kind of alchemical work I do. My experiments require both the porous orange pottery that can absorb components in the crucible and the dark and highly fire resistant pots in which even the strongest metal can be melted. Good quality does come at a high price however...
In time locals will rise to this challenge.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep the laboratory supplied using the pottery from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
Only the best will be good enough!
[Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported pottery from master potters.

The local smiths do not seem to appreciate the great care that must be taken to create the kind of tools we need to work the fires of my laboratory. Perhaps in time they will learn but so far the results have been most disappointing.
In time they will learn.
[Root.GetFullName] will cut costs by relying on local smiths to produce the tools and other ironwork required for [Root.GetHerHis] alchemical experiments.
We must import the tools we need.
[Root.GetFullName] will import alchemical tools from the master smiths that are best skilled to make them.

Sometimes the difference identifying success can be as hard as achieving it. Many metals and other substances are so alike that only an expert can tell them apart. To avoid mishaps perhaps it would be best to invest in a rich library of reference literature to avoid unwelcome surprises.
The books I have will be quite enough.
[Root.GetFullName] will avoid spending money frivolously on books that tell [Root.GetHerHis] what he already knows.
My librarians shall not rest until we have such a collection.
[Root.GetFullName] will ensure the success of [Root.GetHerHis] future experiments by assembling a reference library for all occasions.

It may not be the most advanced office of alchemy, in fact it might well be the opposite of that, but I have finally completed a laboratory in which to conduct my experiments. Soon the secrets of this world will reveal themselves to me!
Time to light the furnace...
Simple Laboratory

In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a small laboratory. It is not the most impressive of alchemical offices but it has the necessities needed to heat, melt and distill various substances.

The work to create an office in which I can conduct my experiments is finally complete! It may not compare to the greatest laboratories of this age but it will surely help me find the knowledge which I seek.
Let us get started!
Laboratory

In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a laboratory. It has the basic necessities needed to heat, distill, putrefy and combine various metals and other substances.
My laboratory is finally completed. Will it be able to fulfill my dreams of enlightenment? Only time will tell...
As Above, So Below
Impressive Laboratory

This character has spent considerable time and money to build a laboratory where metals and other substances can be manipulated. The setup has attracted some attention from others and is the envy of poorer dabblers in the esoteric arts.
The Ambition of a [Root.GetTitle]

After months of hard work and a considerable amount of money spent, the laboratory of [Root.GetFullName] is the envy of anyone who wishes to delve into the deeper secrets of life. This office of alchemy allows the [Root.GetTitle] to perform any experiment that has so far been documented and is a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great ambitions in the field.
As Above, So Below!
State of the Art Laboratory

This character has spent both time and a small fortune to construct a proper office where alchemical experiments can be performed. This laboratory is built to be able to handle any experiment currently documented and employs a small team of helpers to keep all the furnaces going at all times.
The House of Chemistry

With no expenses spared and under the constant supervision of [Root.GetFullName] a house unlike any other has been erected to realize the dream of a perfect alchemical working environment. Many of the contraptions have been conceived and drawn by the [Root.GetTitle] personally and the great number of furnaces alone employs a team of helpers from all the entire realm.\n\nThe office now stands ready to allow [Root.GetFullName] to uncover the secrets of the world, all it requires is for its master to give the instructions.
Time to get to work!
Famous Laboratory

Equal parts brilliance, deep pockets and rigorous discipline has allowed this character to build a palace of the alchemical arts. This laboratory is not only large in size it is pioneering a number of new techniques to manipulate and combine the many substances of the world.
Build a Laboratory
你必须建造一个实验室。通过这个实验室，你可以去探索蕴藏在星空之中的奥秘。
To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Construct Laboratory'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete the construction of a Laboratory.

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to my attention that you still lack a proper office of Alchemy! How can you hope to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], without the proper tools or staff? You should build one or your work will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Master, I feel we are both held back by the lack of a proper office of Alchemy. If we are to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], we will need the proper tools and work space. Unless you build a laboratory or our work here will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

With a laboratory of my own I can proceed to perform greater works than ever before. How I ever got by without a dedicated workspace and the right tools I will never understand. The secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], shall be mine!
我的新实验室折服了我身边所有的人，我打赌就算是[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]都会被这个实验室所打动。现在，我可以利用这个实验室去探索物质和精神的奥秘了。
My work has just begun.
Hermes, the Thrice Blessed
Idris, the Interpreter
The entire castle just shook, waking me from the dreamless sleep that comes after hours of preparatory laboratory work. Did I forget to properly lock the laboratory?
Alas, a sacrifice for science!
We must really tighten up security...
[Root.GetFullName] will spend funds to improve security and increase the efficiency of [Root.GetHerHis] Laboratory.

To the ignorant laboratory equipment can appear both frightening and alien. Word has gotten out of some of the unusual contraptions that have been built for my laboratory. A small mob has assembled outside, demanding answers about why I am constructing so clearly ungodly things.
I must try to accommodate them.
[Root.GetFullName] will make changes to [Root.GetHerHis] laboratory to placate the frightened locals rather than to increase efficiency.
Why listen to rabble?

Disaster has struck! An increasingly foul stench from the kitchen area made the guards investigate my stores of alchemical ingredients. I have been focusing so much on the work of assembling my laboratory that the ingredients have begun to rot!
Save what can be saved.
We must build a better storage for the future!

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are delighted to learn that you have taken your first step towards enlightenment. The secrets of the Corpus may be obscured to you now, but in time you may come to understand them as I have.

Hold in thy mind all thou wouldst know, and [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], will teach thee.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
This is what I desire to hear!

After spending weeks improving the painting I proudly take a step back to behold my work. Sweat gathers on my forehead as I realize what my additions to the painting actually looks like: The original painting is beyond repair! It is now riddled with stick figures, random shapes, and other artistic mishaps.
Has NOT recently ventured to acquired ingredients
Acquire Ingredients

I have called upon my apprentice, [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to help me gather ingredients that are needed for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.

[gathering_companion.GetSocietyRank] [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] has offered [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] help with gathering much needed ingredients for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.
We will gather herbs in the hills.
In the forest we will hunt for the most prized animal parts.
I'm sure we will find useful materials in the marketplace.
On second thought, I don't have time for this.
[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I arrived in the hills early in the morning to collect various useful herbs that we could find in the countryside.
Our combined knowledge will be useful for identifying the plants.
I at least know how to identify some plants.
Which were the poisonous ones again?

[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] is most resourceful. While discussing the different aspects of the elements we identify a plethora of plants by tasting and smelling them and the days pass without us even noticing.
We already have more than we can carry.

We have now spent days looking high and low for useful herbs. With both me and [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] exhausted we are forced to conclude that the small assortment of interesting plants is what we are getting out of this.
At least we got something out of this.
My mouth is feeling funny and numb after [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] got me to taste a weird looking plant.
Let's head home already.

Together with a small band of hunters [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I have set out to hunt animals in the forest in an attempt to gather animal parts. These ingredients will be invaluable in experiments to understanding the aspects of the world.
Our combined hunting experience should make this easy.
Let's catch our prey.
I hope someone here knows how to take down a beast.
With the help of [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] tracking the animals of the forest they now have nowhere to hide. It almost feels too easy now.
一次成功的狩猎
The forest is full of wild animals. Even though they are delusive creatures our cunning is more than enough to find their hiding places.
Some of these parts will prove useful.

As I was nocking an arrow, carefully studying my prey on the other side of the shaft, suddenly [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] starts shouting and screaming. While I'm glaring angrily at [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] and the game runs tauntingly its way, [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] tries to explain [gathering_companion.GetHerselfHimself].\n"The sun-rays weren't hitting the glade and thus the organs would've been useless!"
That's one way to ruin a hunt.

The stalls around us are brimming with all different kinds of goods and people are swarming around us. [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I look each other in the eyes nodding. We know that we will need to be thorough in our search and excellent in our haggling if we want to make some good deals here.
Our charismatic touch bring forth the best wares to the lowest prices.
Better get started then.
What can this thing be worth?

Slipping by the stalls nearly every single one of them has an interesting item. I merely poke [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to make [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] aware of it and [gathering_companion.GetSheHe] puts on the smooth-talking. After [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] haggling people almost end up giving us the items for free.
How did we end up with so many things?

Navigating the different scenes and smells of the town square at this hour can be confusing. Still I managed to find some good quality ingredients at a decent price as did [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName].
You can find the most interesting things here.
No matter how hard we looked there never seemed to be anything interesting. Somehow I still ended up with my bags full of useless junk that someone sold.
I feel fooled.
[Root.gath_res.GetValue] herbal ingredients added to inventory.\n
[Root.gath_res.GetValue] animal part ingredients added to inventory.\n
[Root.gath_res.GetValue] alchemical ingredients added to inventory.\n

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], as you know we're always in need of more ingredients to perform our experiments. These experiments are essential to uncover the mysteries of the world. I propose a joint venture to combine our knowledge in an effort to identify and gather ingredients so that our search for truth will not be halted by such worldly things as material shortages.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
