Failed Prediction
This character is suffering from low self-esteem after publicly failing to predict a star-fall.

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Dear colleague, throughout my studies, I have found the most fascinating phenomena from observing the sky. I am of the firmest belief that the foundation of the cosmos is hiding somewhere out there. In order to reach higher knowledge, you should take my advice and study the skies thoroughly.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank]

After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a lot going on up there, behind the clouds. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.

After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a pattern to the movement of celestial bodies that I have yet to uncover. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.

After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.

After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.
No, I have to keep going.
Yes, enough is enough.
I understand so much.
This has certainly been a very productive evening. I have been able to dedicate all of my thinking to calculate the patterns of the different objects in the sky uninterrupted.
Everything is so clear now.
I should always strive to be this productive.
Studying the vast sky gives me new perspectives.
I've found a new meaning in my life.

My [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] expressed a curious notion, over supper this evening. "I miss your conversation, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [target_spouse.GetFirstName] said, taking another sip of [target_spouse.GetHerHis] drink. "It's all astronomical phenomenon with you these days...! Surely, you could take some nights off from your research?"

Dining with my [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife], the topic of my research came up again. I told [target_spouse.GetHerHim] that I of course regret any ill feelings [target_spouse.GetSheHe] might be experiencing from it, but that I am doing important work. "Honestly, I grow weary of defending myself!", I snapped in the end.
One does not simply take a break from this task.
Of course, I will spend more time with you, [target_spouse.GetFirstName].
Why must we argue about this...?!
You are right, [target_spouse.GetFirstName], I will change my priorities.

I am in the middle of adjusting my new sextant, having just spotted what looked like a shooting star, when there is a faint knock on my door. Opening it, I find my [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] fidgeting nervously. Hesitantly, [target_child.GetSheHe] speaks: "[Root.GetFatherMother]? I... I can't sleep."
You are too old to be afraid of the dark, [target_child.GetFirstName].

Making sure that land owners and traders are paying their taxes in a timely fashion is a time-consuming task. Lately, my mind has been more occupied with the task of making sure that the stars are in their correct place, rather than that the taxes are in my coffers.
What is wealth compared to knowledge?
Some duties can't be neglected.

[target_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has been very cold to me lately. When I approach [target_friend.GetHerHim] about it today, [target_friend.GetSheHe] asks me point blank where I was. "Was when?", I respond. "We had plans to visit my uncle? The one who likes fishing? I knew you weren't all that excited, but I didn't expect you to simply not show up", [target_friend.GetSheHe] mutters.
I.. I have had many important things on my mind, lately.
I understand why you are upset, and I am so sorry, [target_friend.GetFirstName].

While in a meeting with my council, I feel a headache rising inside my skull, making it hard to pick up the different conversations in the room. Lack of sleep is clearly taking its toll on me. Shouting erupts in the room  suddenly [councillor1.GetTitledFirstName] shouts my name, bringing my consciousness back to the room. In a threatening tone, [councillor1.GetSheHe] asks if I agree.
Sure, sure...?
I'm sorry, would you care to explain the matter to me again?

My careful observations of [This.GetRandomPlanetName] has finally allowed me to conclude that the old projections of the planets path across the sky have been flawed. With some precise adjustments I can present a corrected projection.
This will lead me closer to the truth behind the mysteries of the world.

It is an early morning when I, with shaking hand, put my quill down... Is it possible? Have I predicted the traveling of a star-fall? Wiping my brow, I go over my calculations once more  I get the same results, again. It does seem to add up! I lean back in my chair  judging from all the signs, I am fairly certain I know when this marvel will take place.
Come the night, I will gather a crowd to witness it with me!
I should keep this to myself. Just in case I am wrong.

The air is crisp and the sky clear, as people huddle around each other to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise. As the hour begins to slip away, I hear their skeptical mumbling. Then, suddenly, several "Oooh!" and "Aaah!" take place around me, as people excitedly start pointing upwards. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.

The air is crisp, as people gather together at top of the hill, to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise, and I am beginning to worry. Even if I am right, chances are the star-fall won't be visible tonight, as the weather is particularly cloudy. As the moments pass, one person leaves, and I hear people mumbling. The night grows colder. Eventually, I am left alone on the hill.
This is a night we shall all remember.
I am humiliated!

The sky is pitch black and clear as I make my way up the hill. Carrying my instruments, I have a good feeling about my calculations  tonight is the night. I begin to unpack, and I am in the middle of adjusting my lenses, when I realize that the star-fall is visible even without my tools. I gasp, my chest filling with jubilant glee. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.

I have been camped out on the hill for hours, hoping against hope. Maybe I missed it? Maybe my instruments are too weak? I wait even longer, but eventually it dawns on me  I was wrong. I am not sure how, but there is no star-fall.
This is what it's all about.
How could I have been so wrong?

I find myself almost buried under an enormous heap of documents occupying my work desk which I have carefully studied. Yet there is still an absence of any observation about the specific light in the sky between two well-known star formations.
On a dark sheet there lies bright dots scattered around, dancing in a random fashion. No matter how long time I spend staring into the sky, no pattern reveals itself for me.
There must be something wrong with my instruments.
[From.GetBestName] has not only discovered a new bright star in the sky, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to give me the honor of having the sparkling star named after myself!
Do I really deserve this honor?

The instruments and tomes that I had to gather for my studies of the secrets behind the stars have finally arrived. Lenses of different shapes and sizes, together with dusty old tomes written by learned people  these will prove invaluable for uncovering the truth.
Now I can carefully observe the sky.

It is rare to have a completely clear night-sky to observe, yet tonight the weather conditions are perfect. I smile, as I begin to carefully note down the pattern of the celestial bodies. I feel a surge of energy  never have I had such a spectacular view of my own constellation, [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]  I can sense my connection to the elements stronger than ever before.
How exhilarating!

Being at the debate is a draining process. I have not had a good night's sleep since I got here. Either I cannot fall asleep due to a searing pain in the back or I get woken up by loud arguments outside about yesterday's debate topics. Days like these I just long for a warm and cozy bed.
These accommodations are the worst...
I can't take this anymore. I want to go home!
I should use this time for something productive.
Nocturnal Studies
While everyone else is still in a deep slumber, this character is already preparing for the coming day.
Bad Nights
This character is suffering from back pain and headaches due to not having had a proper night's sleep in weeks.
Mischievous Deeds
This character has recently sabotaged the research of a fellow society member.

An opportunity has presented itself for me to level the playing field of the debate. [sabotage_target.GetSocietyRank] [sabotage_target.GetFirstName] a great debater under normal circumstances, [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] is very dependent on [sabotage_target.GetHerHis] meticulous notes.
Perhaps [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] could find some of mine...
It would be a shame if anything happened to those notes.
I will not resort to cheap tricks.
Plant some forged notes about a ground-breaking discovery in a convenient place.\n
Attempt to make the notes unusable.\n

After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.

After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetSillyDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.
Even someone else's knowledge is the path to success.
I have more confidence in my own work.
This is clearly some made-up nonsense!
You will recite your new-found knowledge in an upcoming debate, as if it were your own.\n

While I am sitting and preparing for the debate, studying my notes carefully, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] stumbles and drops everything in [From.GetHerHis] hands. Parchments and quills are strewn everywhere and my notes are now soaked in ink!
An unfortunate accident.
[From.GetFirstName] clearly did that on purpose!
Your preparation notes for today are ruined, decreasing your chances of winning the debate.\n

I was successful in "accidentally" dropping ink on the notes of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], ruining them beyond readability. [From.GetFirstName] was however less than happy with my clumsy behavior...
You can't make an omelete without breaking a few eggs.
I performed splendidly in today's debate, much thanks to the brilliant research I found in the hallway. My competitors were left without any good arguments to counter my impeccable logic.

Reciting the notes I found the other day proved to be an unfortunate mistake... The crowd was loud and vigorous, not because they were struck by my burgeoning intellect, but because they were laughing. Someone must have crafted those notes as a joke!

During today's debate I recited the notes I found the other day far too literally... After a short while someone in the audience started shouting and called me out on being a fraud for stealing their work.
With a little bit of fortune anything is possible.
Your performance greatly impressed everyone present, increasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
I was a fool to believe in those notes!
This embarrassing situation will not soon be forgotten, and decreases your chances of winning the debate.\n
This is embarrassing...
Clearly this must be a mistake, let's calm down for a moment!

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] made a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself] today at the debate, by citing parts of the forged notes I planted some days ago for [From.GetHerHim] to find. At certain moments [From.GetSheHe] had the whole room veritably bursting to tears laughing!
Despite my best effort [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetBestName] has ignored the notes that I deliberately left in plain sight of [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetSheHeCap] sure is gullible...
I'll fool [From.GetHerHim] next time!
You will conclude your research.
While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]!
That was certainly a daring revelation of [From.GetHerHim].
Publicly you will act in the faith of your liege while you keep your old faith in private.\n
You fully embrace the faith of your liege.\n
Shares the same true faith as §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!\n

I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_recruiter.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
Something must have gone wrong.
You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.

I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_inductor.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
Something must have gone wrong.
You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.

As a pious man, after having read the texts of the Vendidad, you are more aware of the Daevas' presence all around you and the danger they put your family and realm in. So, you have decided that your house shall adopt one of the Good Spirit's Dogs.
Vohunazga, the dog without a master.
Vanghapara, the dog with a prickly back.
Sag-e Aabi, the dog of the water.
我们TMD不需要狗!
A Vohunazga of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] is known to the people as a kind creature of Ahura Mazda, protecting your capital from the Daevas which roam in the darkness.
He shall roam free but protected by the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
Take him in! He is one of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].

The dog called Vanghapara is known as a vigilant creature of the Spenta Mainyu. As darkness beckons this dog wakes to keep us safe from its evil creatures. This is why it is such a popular pet among [Root.Religion.GetName] families.
The Vanghapara shall protect my home well.
The dog of the water is the most revered of all the dogs. They are what keeps our fields watered and healthy, our bellies full and worries gone.
It is our honor to house the Sag-e Aabi
Vohunazga Guardian
This character is the guardian of a masterless dog who defends his home from evil spirits.
家犬
This character has taken in a dog into his house which defends him from evil spirits.
Vanghapara Pet
This character has taken in a hedgehog into his house which happily in return hunts down vermin.
Sag-e Aabi Guardian
This character is the guardian of an otter which ensures the wellbeing of the realm.
I've changed my mind...
I accept your gracious offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will make a fine Concubine!
Choose Hermetic Art
Choose to focus on one of the three arts within §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!. Doing so will allow you to choose a lifestyle trait.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order choose one of the three different arts within the Hermetics, allowing you to decide on your lifestyle.
Is allowed to choose a Hermetic Art at this time\n

I have been with the Hermetics for some time and yet, I have not been able to contemplate enough on all of the three arts. If I were to focus on one of the arts I might further increase my understanding of it. But which art should I choose?
Astrology and the study of the stars.
Alchemy and spiritual transformation.
Theurgy and the divine.
I changed my mind. Perhaps another time.
This art will lead to the §YScholar§! trait.
This art will lead to the §YMystic§! trait
This art will lead to the §YTheologian§! trait

As a scholar, I have dedicated much time to the art of studying the stars and celestial bodies. I learned a great deal in doing so. But I should spend more time with the other arts as well. Which one should I focus on more closely?

To study alchemy and how to reach spiritual transformation is indeed a learning experience. Albeit more difficult than one might imagine. But time has come to also master the other arts. Which one should be my focus?

I have attained great knowledge in the art of Theurgy. Learning about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and divine spirits. Yet, to master the truth and understand it, I will need to learn more about the other arts. Which one should I study next?
I shall learn more about astrology.
Alchemy will be my priority.
The art of Theurgy is important.
I will keep my current art for now.

There are many ways in how one may reveal the secrets behind the movement of stars and celestial bodies. I could set up the needed equipment to study them myself. Alternatively, I could look at the existing research of known authors and researchers.
I have to see it for myself.
Looking at the work of others is a good start.
Use your existing equipment.\n
Purchase the necessary equipment.\n
Standing outside and gazing upon the night sky is invigorating! I have yet to fully grasp the secrets hidden from me. Knowing that I can find the meaning behind the stars, I refuse to give up.
Time will tell if I am worthy.
To master the art of alchemy is not an easy task. It may take years before I can make any notable progress. I must decide how best to pursue this knowledge.
Learning by doing will lead the way.
Careful studies and observation is key.
Alchemy is the key component of uncovering the truth, that much I know. But I still have much to learn and discover. Dedication and resolve will be my allies.
So much to learn. So little time.

One way to better understand [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is the use of white magic, in which you pray to divine spirits in order to use their guidance. This is known as Theurgy. Another path is that of Goetia. To use black magic by seeking out foul demons and heeding their advice.
Only the divine can teach me.
There is nothing wrong with demons, is there?

Divine enlightenment is not something you easily achieve. Even if I have made some progress already, it has been slow and I have merely scratched the surface. How will I ever learn the truth at this pace?
I suppose only [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] can deem me worthy.
Stargazer
Theoretical Alchemist
An alchemist who prefers the theoretical approach of careful studies.
Experimenting Alchemist
An alchemist who prefers the practical approach of performing experiments.
Divine Alliance
This character prays to divine spirits to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
Demon Alliance
This character prays to demons to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
Completely controls the §Y$TITLE$§!
Does NOT completely control the §Y$TITLE$§!
Has NOT invited to stargazing in the past three years\n
Stargazing
This option is available due to you owning an observatory\n
This option is available due to you owning observatory equipment\n
Make the needed preparations for the coming night.
Invite to Stargazing
Invite §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a night of stargazing and studies in an attempt to better understand how it works. This is also a good opportunity to get to know each other.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I write to you with a proposition. We are both esteemed members of [Root.Society.GetName] and I think we could learn much from one another. I hereby invite you to a night of discoveries and to study the sky.

Your fellow [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
I would be delighted to come!
Perhaps another time.

To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your invitation arrived as a very pleasant surprise. I would be honored to study with you and will prepare my journey shortly.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I received your invitation, but I fear that I will have to decline. It is currently impossible for me to make any travel arrangement on such a short notice. I hope you understand.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]

It seems that more important matters have been brought to me. I will have to cancel the invitation I sent to [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]. The night of studies and stargazing will have to wait.
Another time perhaps.
Cancel the planned night of stargazing and notify [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I fear that urgent matters require my attention for now. We will have to perform our planned studies of the night sky at another time. I pray that you will not be too disappointed.

[From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]

My guest [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] has finally arrived. I have been looking forward to the two of us getting together and review the work of each other. There is still some time before nightfall, however. I have a few suggestion of how we could spend the time.
Have you seen my observatory?
I will show you my instruments.
I have the perfect location in mind.
How about a small feast in your honor?
Time not spent studying is time lost.
Show your guest to your observatory.
Show your guest the tools you possess to use for stargazing.
Show your guest to the nearby location to use for the coming night.
Spend the time with a small feast.
Spend the time by studying in preparation of the coming night.

When arriving in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was greeted with a smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]. I quickly unpacked but I could tell that [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] was eagerly waiting for me. 'I would like to show you my observatory', [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] said as [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] was turning to lead the way. Once inside, carefully crafted tools and lenses could be seen everywhere.
This is truly impressive!
I fail to see the magnificence really.

I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] the way to the observatory. When we stepped inside, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] gazed in wonder at the various tools. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] went on to ask about the different instruments and how to use them. At which times you are more likely to see the stars more clearly. The questions kept coming for quite a while.
I am glad [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] liked it!

I lead [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the observatory and waited for [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] reaction when we stepped inside. At first [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only looked around. After a while [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] asked a few simple question but I got the feeling that it was not very impressive.
Oh well. We are here to study after all.

[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] greeted me when I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. After a short conversation [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] lead the way to [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] study. When we stepped inside I immediately noticed all the tools and lenses. It would seem that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] owns quite a collection of stargazing equipment.
Magnificent tools I must say.
Anyone can acquire such common items, no?

I guided [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the study to showcase my stargazing tools. I could see that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was delighted as [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] spent quite some time inspecting them. We talked about the tools for quite a while. We even had a long conversation just about lenses. Small lenses and larger lenses, and knowing when to use which ones.
You may use them later tonight.

I arrived at the study with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] closely behind me. 'This is the equipment I have obtained', I explained and gestured towards the neatly ordered collection of tools. [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] inspected the collection for a moment, but did not look very impressed. Or at least as something [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] has seen before.
At least I like them.

Upon my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName], I was received with great splendor. [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] explained that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] had chosen a perfect location to use during the night. 'This way and I will show it to you.' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] lead the way to a hill not too far away. The hill had a decent height for its small size and no trees obscuring the view.
This will suit our needs perfectly!
A lonely hill in the middle of nowhere...

We walked to the hill of my choice not far away. Once there, [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] took a moment to look at the hill and the sky above. 'This hill should suit our needs perfectly I think.' [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] said while nodding approvingly. We quickly decided on where to set up in order to be able to see as much as possible.
It is all about location, location, location.

I walked with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the nearby hill I had chosen for us. While pointing to a few places that I think would work well for us, I hear [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] complaining behind me. Clearly disapproved of my choice. 'I suppose it will do. But it seems to be very far away if you ask me.'
Trust me. It offers a better view.

When I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was not only met with a warm smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], but a grand feast as well! A wide range of courses had been prepared for our pleasure and indulgence. [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] raised a cup in my honor. 'Let us toast for a night of new discoveries!'
A spectacular feast I must say!
Is it not a bit excessive?

When [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] entered the dining hall, I think the feast came as a surprise. And a very pleasant one at that. We dined and enjoyed ourselves and had a good time just speaking with each other for the next few hours. 'You have outdone yourself, [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]. This was spectacular!'
The wonders of good food.

I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the dining hall and the awaiting feast. The look on [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] face made it abundantly clear that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was not expecting a proper feast. Perhaps [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was expecting a small dinner? Did I overdo it?
It tasted good at least.

[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was there to welcome me on my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. Shortly thereafter we made the way to [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]'s private study, where [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] began to show me his current work and most recent discoveries. 'How better to pass the time before nightfall than to spend it on studies and learning?'
That is why I am here.
Even learning is best in moderation.

Knowing that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] is a learned man I showed him to my study. After discussing my most recently acquired writings I suggested that we sit down and try to learn something from them. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] responded with approval. 'I would never say no to an opportunity of gathering newfound knowledge. That is after all, the reason I am here.'
知识就是力量.

Thinking that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] would jump at the chance of examining my most recently acquired writings, I showed [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim] my collection. After a moment of glancing through the pages, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] casually put the writings back in their place. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then suggested that we rest before the night.
I presume the journey was long?

Night is almost upon us and the first stars are finally making themselves visible on the sky outside. I should tell [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] that it is time. Time to see if we can uncover new secrets.
We should get ready.

[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and me have been looking at the stars for a few hours already. Suddenly, it occurred to me. Stars are aligned in different patterns, taking on the shapes of different figures. But they are not really moving, are they? They always seem to have the same location in relation to one another.
[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]! Take notes!

I was reading through our notes when [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] suddenly shouted at me. '[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]! It just occurred to me!' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] then went on explaining [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] theory about how the stars never move and how they are related to one another.
[stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] could be on to something!

I was writing down some notes when I heard [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] speak behind me and turned to face [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then went on to explain a theory of how the zodiacs are connected with each other how they are aligned in a certain way.
Yes. Interesting thoughts.

When looking at the stars and the patterns they create on the sky, I started thinking on the zodiacs. I quickly explained my newfound theory to [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] who nodded in agreement. The zodiacs are sure to be hiding secrets waiting to be unveiled.
I am certain of it!

After several hours of studying the stars, I saw it. A sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. I called for [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to get [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] attention. We both marveled at the beauty of it for a while. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] said after a moment of silence. I could only nod my head in agreement.
It makes us seem so small.

After several hours of studying the stars, we noticed a sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. Both me and [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] marveled at the beauty of it. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] nodded slowly in response. 'It is. But it is hardly an omen of the end times like the peasants would make you believe.'
No it is not. But it is beautiful.

[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and I have been taking turns in making observations and recording everything. I cannot say that we have made any significant discoveries so far. We have made some progress, however, and learned a few things we did not know before.
The night is not over yet.

We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. Neither [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] nor I has made any noticeable progress so far. With most of the night gone already, it is unlikely that we will accomplish much more.
What a disappointing night.

We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. But neither of us has been able to make any significant progress. Which is disappointing, to say the least. But I can see that my host, [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], is more disappointed than I am. [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] probably had very high hopes for the night.
我也是。

The sky was filled with ominously dark clouds already when we started our observations. As the hours drags on, it is only getting worse. You cannot see anything by now! Not a single star in sight! I suppose we might as well call it a night right here...
Curse this weather!

After spending to night together with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName], I feel like we have become quite close. We seem to complement each other perfectly and the both of us are having a really good time!
I have gained a new friend!

Accepting the invitation to come here and spend the night studying with [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was the correct decision. I have not had this much fun talking to someone in quite a while. We seem to understand each other perfectly!
Thank you my friend.

This night seem to never end. I am wondering why I even invited [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] in the first place. Nothing I have done so far seem to please [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. Whenever I try to start a conversation to lighten the mood, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only answer with an obnoxious remark.
I cannot wait for you to leave...

I should just have thrown away [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] invitation the moment it arrived. This night has been nothing short of horrible. Listening to [stargazing_host.GetHerHim] hurling one insult after the other. One might be thinking if that is the reason why [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] invited me here!
I have never been so offended!

Dawn is upon us as the first light appears on the horizon. I think we can agree that the night was an immense success. We took plenty of notes and learned a thing or two. Maybe we will have an opportunity to continue our combined research in the future?

An exhausting night finally ends. We worked throughout the entire night without any sort of noticeable progress at all. While it feels disappointing, I am confident that continued observations will yield superior results.

Time really do fly when you are having fun. We did not make any sort of noticeable progress in our attempted research. But the night was spent in good company, making it feel much less of a disappointment.
Let us do this again sometime.
Progress takes time.
Progress or not. I had a great time!
Time to go home.
Hold a Grand Debate
Hold a grand debate for all members of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to join. Spending several days discussing and arguing in the name of knowledge and learning.
Send an invitation to all members of [Root.Society.GetName].
A Grand Debate is NOT currently in progress\n
A Grand Debate has NOT been held in the past 10 years\n
The Grand Debate
As a distinguished leader of [From.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited all members to partake in a Grand Debate.
Participating members will gain an increased opinion of §G5§! towards you for five years\n
Debater
This character is known to be performing very well in debates and discussions.
Held a Grand Debate
Winner of a Grand Debate
Held a Grand Debate
Held Grand Debates

As I expect many members of [Root.Society.GetName] to appear for the Grand Debate, it is of the utmost importance that everything is to be as flawless as possible. In this spirit the preparations are well underway  my staff has seen to the lodgings and the chef has stocked up the larders. All that is left now is to send out the invitations.
Bring me my most trusted courier!

A courier just arrived carrying a letter from [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Reading the letter, I see that it is an invitation bidding all members of [FromFrom.Society.GetName] to attend the Grand Debate.
A most excellent opportunity to display my knowledge!
A foolish endeavor.
The guest are arriving in this very moment. It is time for the grand debate to begin and spend the next few days to have each and every one display their knowledge to decide who the best of us is.
Let the debate commence!
I have been declared the winner of the grand debate! Showing all that no one is as knowledgeable as me, or has the ability to put forth arguments quite like me.
The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
Many distinguished themselves during the debates. None however, performed as well as [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has been declared the winner of the grand debate!
Well done!
Congratulations are in order.

After several days of long discussions and much debating, the grand debate is over for now. There might have been a few heated arguments, but I think most attenders would agree that it was a learning experience.
A most successful event!
I may not have won the grand debate itself, but I have had plenty of success nonetheless. The debates allowed me to learn new ways of putting my education to good use and even how to improve upon it!

The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have learned new ways of putting my education to good use.
A triumph in my eyes.
The grand debate ends and I was not able to win. I did however, show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.

The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I think that I was able to show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.
A noteworthy success.
The grand debate ends and although I was unable to win, I learned a few things by observing the other participants.
The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I did learn a few things by observing the other participants.
A worthwhile effort.
The grand debate ends and I was unable to win. I cannot say that I learned anything during the discussions either. Study and preparation will be key for the next debate.

The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have much to learn. I will have to prepare myself better for the next debate.
It was still time well spent.
The grand debate ends and I did not achieve anything at all. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.

The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I did not achieve anything. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.
A shameful display...

Divine Epiphany
This character has had an epiphany as a result of a divine ritual. Integral parts of the world, and the Truths hidden within it, suddenly seem clearer.
Unworthy Hermetic
This character was unable to understand the cryptic advice given by a summoned divine being, and is therefore deemed to be an unworthy Hermetic.

My [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement in the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.

My dear [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement by the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.
The secrets of the world shall be laid bare to us!
Though, what if I am not worthy enough to understand it?
What if we anger the being? We should not meddle in the divine...
Summoning the Divine

The time for the ritual has come, and your Order has congregated in a spacious room. Symbols scatter the floor as you chant your hymns. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has provided you all with a new, special type of incense that [From.GetSheHe] claims is necessary to make the eventual connection with the Divine Being. Before long it has permeated the air, and as you inhale more and more of it, hearing the drone of your fellows' chants, you feel your soul disconnect from your body and begin to ascend...\n\n...until it seems to connect with something. An... entity touches your soul, though you cannot perceive it with any senses other than your mind's eye. It must be the Divine Being! You have succeeded! You struggle to control your emotions, and to coalesce all your thoughts into one burning question that you pose to this being...
Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the Sun!
Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the stars!
Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the gods!
Oh Divine, pray tell me of the secrets hidden throughout the world!

In my trance, the Divine Being tells me of great Truths that have been hidden from Man  of alchemy and astrology, of the will of the gods, of the cyphers to ancient texts, and even of things that have not yet come to pass. Once my soul returns to my body, I see the world with new eyes!

The Divine Being gave me a cryptic reply to my question, and for many days since the ritual I have tried to make sense of it... Yet, no matter how much time I spend on it, I cannot. Whatever the Being intended for me to know is beyond my capacity to understand  I can only conclude I simply am not worthy of its knowledge...

The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of alchemy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!

The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of astrology in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!

The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of Theurgy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!

The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the decryption of hidden secrets throughout the world, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
The Divine Being has my total confidence!
It's an epiphany!
Oh, the shame!

Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own portrait in order to write an enciphered book of your knowledge. This is an artifact with potentially powerful bonuses, which only characters with high learning can decipher.
a rather simplistic
an entirely average
an excellent
a truly revolutionary
Write a Theorem Paper
Do research and write a theorem paper on a topic, before sending it out for peer review. Should it become accepted by at least 3 out of 5 peers, you will gain a reward.
Has NOT recently written a theorem paper\n

I face the daunting task of researching and writing an entire theorem paper, to be reviewed by my peers... To have it be accepted by the Order would be a great boon to me, but if the quality is found to be lacking it might be a big blow to my prestige.
I will make a decent effort.
The risks and rewards may be what they are, you have neither the time nor the resources to make an extraordinaire effort, and will rely on your intelligence rather than on hard work.
I will ask help from those around me.
With the help from some other bright minds you might well stand a better chance at success!
Surely nobody would notice if I copied from some other works?
The findings of other, brighter minds than yourself might well help the quality of your own paper.
I will make an extraordinary effort! No expense shall be spared.
You will spend extra time and resources on writing the theorem paper, even if this comes to the detriment of managing your realm. Surely this will produce a paper of high quality!
Focusing on Theorem Paper
This character is focusing on writing a theorem paper, and is therefore unable to spend enough time actually governing.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on theurgic rituals! It explores potentially new and rewarding ways of summoning divine beings, which might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on ascension! It explores the concept of ascension, and new ways by which this state might be achieved, which in turn might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! It explores the Divine Truth that permeates this world, and might provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on hieroglyphic translation! It explores the hidden meaning in these ancient texts, which might in turn provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on distillation! It explores new methods of the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fermentation! It explores new approaches to the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the mysterious Elixir of Life! It explores the concept, both as a source for life eternal as well as a cure for all diseases, and it delves into potential methods of creating it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Philosopher's Stone! It explores the object, and its powers of transmuting cheap metal into gold, as well as how to create it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the planets! It explores astrology, in particular the movement of the planets, and what this could be interpreted as. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the stars! It explores astrology, in particular the constellations, and what truths they contain. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Moon! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Sun! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
I will send it out, at once!
You send out the paper and await your peers' replies. Hopefully they will be objective when they evaluate it...
No... It's not good enough to be published.
You destroy the paper. This failure shall never see the light of day!
it is rather simplistic and not terribly impressive.
it was a solidly average effort, but nothing more.
it makes some very excellent and intriguing points!

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. This has given me an opportunity to create a Fraticelli Papacy, which shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to create a Fraticelly Papacy, claiming it shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

As the great city of Constantinople is in Iconoclast hands, I have taken this chance to create the Iconoclast Patriarchate so that it may do away with the heretical idolatry the Ecumenical Patriarchate has long been guilty of. The new Iconoclast Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Ecumenical predecessors.

朝圣中
这名角色正在朝圣的途中。

Knowing of the inevitable coming of Ragnarok, as foretold in their saga scriptures, Norse believers will work even in secret to prepare the world for the snowy hell of the Fimbulvetr and the great battles of all-consuming fire it presages. Practicing their secret rituals in the name of the Allfather, they will accept any kind of warrior who can stand with them in the struggle against the chaos and desolation that other faiths seem intent on bringing upon the world.

As children of Dievas, the hidden followers of the Baltic faith know that everything is connected through the divine spirit, even those who oppress them. So it is that they continue their work unabated, spreading the words of the High Priest even among those who are at first unwilling to listen. Through the divine commonality of Perkunas, Saule or Daugava, they believe anyone can find a home with them.
尽管在其他宗教准则之下，索米多神教信仰的信念仍顽强地存于部分人心中。他们于世间万籁俱寂之处同自然沟通，寻觅真主。他们在月光皎洁、树影斑驳、溪流淙淙之地秘密的崇拜他们的圣主。这种宁静并不能长久，它很快将被乘着闪电战车的雷神乌戈所打破。雷神会用雷霆把不信者化为齑粉。
地下斯拉夫信徒在狂风暴雨中祈祷，雷声掩盖了他的祷告，暗藏的斧头护身符标志了他们的身份，表明了他们对雷神佩龙的忠诚。此时他们坚信追杀他们的人将会像橡树难敌雷电一样，无力的抵抗即将到来的雷神佩龙之怒火。

No matter how far you travel, and no matter what unbelievers say, you are always under the Heavenly Father, and standing upon the Earth Mother. This is how the followers of Tengri can be so certain in their faith that they follow it even in the face of persecution. All they have to do to prove their faith is to lift their eyes towards Tengri of the Blue Sky above, feel the protection nature provides, and let their Wind Horses ride in prayer to a better place.

As preachers proselytize, there are those who play their part, but in secret turn to the forces around them. No other gods have shown them the small miracles of the world, or the sheer divinity of life and existence. They tell each other stories of how faith does not reside in some otherworldly realm, but in the trees around them, the rocks by their feet, and the waters they drink of.

The secret followers of Zun have little need for foreign faiths. The answer to every theological challenge and every moment of doubt is right in the sky above them, every day, without fail. It is what brings life and hope, deserving of every prostration. Just as Zun never fails to bring warmth to the earth and drive the night away, his followers will rise on the other side of their own long night.
